116a4(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pa lags so// tshul khrims
116a5(khri brgyad stong pa): shes bgyi ba dang / ting nge 'dzin ces bgyi ba dang / shes rab ces bgyi ba dang / rnam par grol ba zhes bgyi ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba zhes bgyi ba'i ming ni gang gis
116a6(khri brgyad stong pa): brjod du mamachis pa lags so// rgyun du thugs pa zhes 'argya ba'i ming ni gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis pa lags so// rgyan du zhugs pa'i chos rnams shes bgyi ba'i ming dang / ldan /
116a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rtsi ri 'a ba zhes bgyi ba dang / phyir mo'ing nas bgyi ba dang / dgra bcom pa zhes bgyi ba dang / rang sangs rgyas shes 'gyi ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba dang / byang chub sem
116b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ma shes kyi ma dang / sa sa shes dang nas rnams ces / sa
116b2(khri brgyad stong pa): lung dum stan pa 'am/ khanamatho ba dang bcas pa 'am/ lanamamo snyam mchis pa 'am/ dag pa'am/ me rgyus pa'am/ dag na/ thug basprul ba 'du/ sa pasu
116b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mamachis pa 'am/ lci ba'am/ mazhi ba 'am/ dben pa'am/ mi dben pa 'am/ dngas po'am/ dngas po ma mchis pa gang gis kyang brjod du ma mchis te/ bcom ldan
116b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das bdag gis don gyi dbang 'di mthong bas/ 'di skad du bdag gis chos thams cad kyi 'phel ba dang / 'grib pa ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bzhin du 'di lta ste/ byang /
116b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bgyi bar ming gdags pa ni bdag gi 'gyod par 'gyur ba lags so zhes gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ming de'ang gan
116b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis pa lags so// de co'i slad du zhe na/ mi re ma mchis pas/ de ltar na ming de gnas pa ma mchis/ thug pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ma
116b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa brjod pa'i tshe/ sems zhum par mi 'gyur/ kun tu zhum par mi 'gyur la/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur zhing / mi skrag mo
117a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dadang la dang bar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dran phyir mi ldog pa'i sal mi brgyas pa'i tshul gyis gnas nas/ rnam pa thams cad brkyen pa'i/
117a2(khri brgyad stong pa): du nges par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas gzugs la
117a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnams par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig la gnas par mi bgyi'o// rna ba dang / snru
117a4(khri brgyad stong pa): k+She dang / lus dang / yid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig
117a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas
117a6(khri brgyad stong pa): par mi bgyi'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// rna ba dang / sna dang / k+She dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
117a7(khri brgyad stong pa): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la gnas par mi bgyi'o// des sa'i khams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam ma'
117b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'ams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams la gnas par mi 'gyi'o// des ma rig pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang /
117b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du nan/ bcom ldan 'das
117b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar gzugs gzugs kyis stong zhing tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das gzug
117b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags la/ gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs lags so//
117b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das tshor ba'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de tshor ba ma lags la/ tshor ba las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang tshor ba las/
117b6(khri brgyad stong pa): so bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de 'du shes ma lags la/ 'du shes las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ 'du shes nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags
117b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid kyang 'du shes lags so// bcom ldan 'das 'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de 'du byed rnams ma lags la 'du byed rnams las bud na'ang stong ba nyid ma mchis te/
118a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du byed rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang 'du byed rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rnam/
118a2(khri brgyad stong pa): par shes pa ma lags la/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so/
118a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs la gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes
118a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// khams dang skyed mched rnams la'ang de bzhin du sbyar ro// sa'i khams ni sa'i khams kyis stong ste/
118a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de sa'i khams ma lags la/ sa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang
118a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sa'i khams lags so// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
118a7(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa'i khams ma lags la/ rnam par shes pa'i khams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nyid kyang stong/
118b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams lags so// ma rig pa ni ma rig pas stong ste/ ma rig pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de ma rig pa ma lags la ma rig pa las/
118b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang ma rig pa lags so// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang /
118b3(khri brgyad stong pa): skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shaM nI rga shes skyong ste/ rga shi'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de rga shi ma
118b4(khri brgyad stong pa): legs la/ rga shi las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ rga shi nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang rga shi lags so// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub
118b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ ma rig pa dang rga shi'i bar la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub
118b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
118b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pas stong su/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags la/
119a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang dran pa nye bar
119a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhag pa rnams lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas dran pa nye bar
119a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhag pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang /
119a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phags pa'i bden pa dang bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
119a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dgu dang / stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang
119a6(khri brgyad stong pa): byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa ni sangs
119a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pas stong ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnam
119b1(khri brgyad stong pa): las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams lags pa'i slad du'o//
119b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
119b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du
119b4(khri brgyad stong pa): zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de sbyin
119b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags la/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang sbyin
119b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam
119b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha
120a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang lags pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags la/ shes rab
120a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa las gud na'ang stong pa nyid ma mchis te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags pa'i slad du'o//
120a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas par mi brdzi'o//
120a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// yi ge mngon par
120a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bsgrub pa rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// gcig brjod pa dang / gnyis brjod pa dang / tha dad par brjod pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das/
120a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ltar yi ge rnams ni yi ge rnams kyis stong sde/ bcom ldan 'das yi ge rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de yi ge rnams ma lags la/ yi ge rnams las gud na'ang stong pa
120a7(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid ma mchis te/ yi ge rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang yi ge rnams lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
120b1(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas yi ge rnams la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sem dpa' chen po shes
120b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs mi rtag go zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag go/
120b3(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs mi rtag pa ni gzugs mi rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid
120b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang lags pa de mi rtag pa nyid ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te/ mi rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid lags pa'i sla
120b5(khri brgyad stong pa): du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o//
120b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa
120b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ni rnam par shes pa mi rtag pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ste/ mi rtag pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de mi rtag pa nyid ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang mi rtag pa nyid ma mchis te/ mi
121a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rtag pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang mi rtag pa nyid lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnams grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
121a2(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du gzugs sdug bsngal ba dang / bdag med pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan
121a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dben pa zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba
121a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang bdag med pa dang // zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / dben pa zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar/
121a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa'i dben pa ni rnam par shes pa'i dben pas stong ste/ rnam par shes pa'i dben pa nyid gang lags pa de rnam par shes pa ma lags la/ rnam par shes pa las gud na'ang dben/
121a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid ma mchis te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang dben pa nyid lags/ dben pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa'
121a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas rnam par shes pa dben pa zhes bgyi bar gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
121b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin nyid la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni de bzhin nyid kyis stong ste/
121b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang lags pa de de bzhin nyid ma lags la/ stong pa nyid las gu na'ang de bzhin nyid ma mchis te/ de bzhin nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags
121b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid kyang de bzhin nyid lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de bzhin
121b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas par mi bgyi'o// de bzhin nyid du chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas par mi bgyi'o//
121b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
121b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ltar gzus kyi sgo ni gzungs kyi sgos stong ste/ bcom ldan 'das gzungs kyi rgar stong pa nyid gang lags pa de gzungs kyi sgom lags la/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzungs kyi rnam mam
121b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gzungs kyi sgo nyid kyang stong pa nyid lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzungs kyi sgo lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
122a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la gnas par mi bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
122a2(khri brgyad stong pa): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis gzugs la gnas na/ de gzugs mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa
122a3(khri brgyad stong pa): lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas na/ de rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du bgyi ba
122a4(khri brgyad stong pa): la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
122a5(khri brgyad stong pa): la sgom pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su
122a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzogs par ma gyur par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyor
122a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / ra yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams la gnas na/ de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi/ shes rab kyi pha
122b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/
122b2(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs
122b3(khri brgyad stong pa): par ma gyur par rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa
122b4(khri brgyad stong pa): thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te ngar 'dzin pa dang / nga yir 'dzin par lhung ba'i yid kyis de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos
122b5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gnas na/ de mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa lags kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/
122b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mngon par 'du bgyi ba la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa ma lags/ shes rab
122b7(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 'dzin pa ma lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug pa ma lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur par
123a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis/ tshor
123a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ gzugs kyi yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang
123a3(khri brgyad stong pa): lags pa de rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas/ gzugs ma lags shing / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa
123a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang lags pa de rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas/ rnam par shes pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// yang dag pa'i mtha' bar ni yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du
123a5(khri brgyad stong pa): zhe na/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid lags pas/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma lags pa'i slad du'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
123a6(khri brgyad stong pa): de'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas
123a7(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis stong par brtag par bgyi ste/ ci nas chos gang la'ang yid rnam par rgyu bar mi 'gyur ba de ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni byang chub sems dpa'
123b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor chos thams cad yongs su ma gzung ba zhes bgyi ba ste/ rgya che ba/ phul du bgyi ba tshad ma mchis pa/ nges pa mi 'phrogs pan
123b2(khri brgyad stong pa): thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor de la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ rnam pa thams cad
123b3(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur lags so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
123b4(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med/
123b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /
123b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi slad du yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa lags so// de ci'i slad du na na/ de ni
123b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan mar brjod pa ma lags te/ 'di ltar mtshan ma ni nyon mongs pa lags pa'i slad du'o// mtshan ma gang lags she na/ gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
124a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so// mig ni mtshan ma lags so// rna ba dang sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni mtshan ma
124a2(khri brgyad stong pa): lags so// gzugs ni mtshan ma lags so// sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams ni mtshan ma lags so// mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags
124a3(khri brgyad stong pa): song rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so// mig/
124a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gi 'dus te reg pa ni mtshan ma lags so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te rag pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg
124a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ni mtshan ma lags so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lags so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba
124a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang nga lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba ni mtshan ma lags so// sa'i khams
124a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ni mtshan ma lags so// chu'i khams dang / me'i khams dang / rlung gi khams dang / nam mkha'i khams dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams ni mtshan ma lags so// ma rig pa ni mtshan ma
124b1(khri brgyad stong pa): lugs so// 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang / tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang /
124b2(khri brgyad stong pa): skye ba dang / rga shi ni mtshan ma lags so// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang / yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / spobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
124b3(khri brgyad stong pa): lam dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / spobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid dang @
124b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ma mchis pa dang / smon pa ma mchis pa dang / mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma mchis pa dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzung
124b5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi sgo rnams ni mtshan ma lags so// yi ge rnams ni mtshan ma lags so// gcig brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so// gnyis brjod pa ni mtshan ma lags so// tha dad pa brjod pa
124b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ni mtshan ma lags so// mngon par shes pa ni mtshan ma lags so// ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad ni mtshan ma lags te/ de ni nyon mongs pa zhes bgyi'o// gal te shes
124b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de mtshan mar gzung bar bgyi ba zhig lags na ni/ kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs bstan pa 'dir thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de la dad pa thob par mi 'gyur lags so// dad pa
125a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yid ches pa dang / rtog pa dang / mos pa dang / rten pa dang / sems pa dang / 'jal ba dang / dpyod pa/
125a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ste de'ang mtshan pa'i tshul du ma lags/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa'i tshul du'ang ma lags so// de ltar de ni mtshan ma dang / mtshan ma ma mchis pra dang / gzung ba ma mchis par gzung bar gyi/
125a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ba lags te/ kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs kyang thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'di la mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang bas nyi tshe ba'i shes pas zhugs te/ de zhugs nas gzugs yong su ma gzung /
125a4(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su ma gzung lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos
125a5(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad la yongs su 'dzin pa po ma dmigs pa'i slad du'o// de yang ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa lags par nang du yang dag par rjes su
125a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ma mthong / phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa lags par phyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de thob pa dang / mngon
125a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rtogs pa lags par gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang gis rtogs par bgyid pa dang // gang rtogs par bgyid pa dang /
125b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gang rtags par bgyid pa'i chos de ma dmigs yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste/ shes pa de gzugs kyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du
125b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su mthong shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'dugs dang / du
125b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de gzugs kyi nang dang phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang /
125b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i nang dang phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de gzugs las gzhan du yang dag par rjes su ma
125b5(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa ri tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa las gzhan du'ang yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o// de bzhin du shes pa de yang dag pa'i ma
125b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bar gyi nang du yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / shes pa de yang dag pa'i phyi rol tu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong / phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi slad du shes pa de yang dag pa'i mtha' las gzhan du'ang
125b7(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ba'i slad du'o// rnam grangs 'di la kun tu rgyu bzo sbyangs mos par gyur te/ de 'dir mos nas dad pas rjes su 'brang bas chos nyid tshad mar bgyi ste/ chos thams cad/
126a1(khri brgyad stong pa): #mi dmigs pa'i skad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes la zhugs par shAr te/ de de ltar mos nas des chos gang yang mtshan ma ma mchis par mid la gyid/
126a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i slad du/ chos gang yang yongs su gzung ba ma mchis lags so// chos thams cad gzung du ma mchis pa dang / gtang du ma mchis pa'i slad du des gang yongs su gzung bar bgyi ba'am/
126a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gtang bar bgyi ba'i chos gang yang ma dmigs te/ chos thams cad la rlom sems ma mchis pa'i slad du/ de ni mya ngan las 'das pas kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba ma mchis lags so//
126a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par /
126a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis pa'i slad du/ yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi pha rol tu mchis pas/ byang chub
126a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// de ni smon lam dag yongs su ma rdzogs shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag yongs sum
126a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzogs kyi bar du bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' lags so// de ci'i slad du na ni/ sngon lam de dag smon 'am ma lags/ stobs de dag stongs ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa de dag ni 'jigs
126b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ma lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa de dag so so yang dag par rig pa ma lags shing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du/
126b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa rnams ma lags te/ de dag ni chos kyang ma lags/ chos ma lags pa'ang ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad yongs su gzung ba ma mchis
126b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i slad du/ gang gzugs yongs su mi 'dzin pa dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du yongs su mi 'dzin pa de ni gzhan gyi pha rol tu mchis pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
126b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags so// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po bdun pa/ bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems da
126b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas 'di ltar yongs su brtag par bgyi ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni gang gi
126b6(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ci zhig na zhes yongs su brtag par bgyi'o// de de ltar yongs su rtog cing / de ltar nges par sems pa'i tshe/
126b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gal te chos ma mchis shing mi dmigs pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lags par yang dag par rjes su mthong na/ de legs par mthong ba lags te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di
127a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar chos thams cad ni mA dmigs shing mi dmigs pa'i slad du'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//
127a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos gang dag med cing mi dmigs pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid
127a3(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog
127a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa spyod pa nyid/
127a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa med cing mi dmigs/
127a6(khri brgyad stong pa): so bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
127a7(khri brgyad stong pa): med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar yang med cing mi dmigs
127b1(khri brgyad stong pa): song tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ gzugs med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes/
127b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med cing mi dmigs so// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so// mngon par shes pa med cing
127b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mi dmigs so// sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin nyid med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos nyid
127b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rgyun du zhugs pa'ang med cing mi
127b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dgra bcom pa dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du'ang med cing mi dmigs so// nang stong pa nyid dang
127b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir/ thams cad shes pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
127b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang med cing mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa gal te sems
128a1(khri brgyad stong pa): mi lus mi grong du/ mi klag mi rlung shing dang dubar mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sa rnas dpa' sems rab 'chen pa don du 'ardzu sa dang rkyen pa nga
128a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rim par bya'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i dus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phying byang chub sems dpa' sems da
128a3(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ma bral bar rig par bya/ rab 'byor gyis spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba ste// byang chub sems dang /
128a4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas de yang dgu pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
128a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// tshe dang ldan pas/
128a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
128a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du sbyar te/ tshe dang ldan shA ri'i bu sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi rang bzhin dang dra
128b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'ol yang dag pa'i mtha' yang yang dag pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshor ba dang // 'du shes dang / du byer/
128b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor yang dag pa'i mtha'i bar du rang bzhin ji lta bu yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs
128b3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi rang bzhir ni dngos po med du'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mtho'i dor
128b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rang 'dzid ni dngos pa med pa b+he/ tshe dang ldan pa shA bri rnam grangs des ni 'di sar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ban// tshar ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
128b5(khri brgyad stong pa): par shes pa rnams par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o// de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha' bur ni yang dag pa'i mtha'i rang bzhin dang bral bar rig par bya'o// tshe dang
128b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ga # / mtshad #
129a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang bral ba'o// ga ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang graslab pa 'di slob pa de rnam tha thams cad mkhyen pa da du/
129a2(khri brgyad stong pa): nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tsho dang ldan pa shA m+bI'i bu de de zhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rjen pa gang ts+tsha
129a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ba 'di la slob pa 'di ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir na nA/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad ma skyes shing byung ba med du'i phyir mi/
129a4(khri brgyad stong pa): shA ri'i bus spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par 'byung ba med pa yin// rab 'byor gyis spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/
129a5(khri brgyad stong pa): de la skye ba dang 'byung ba mi dmigs so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang 'byung ba mi dmigs so//
129a6(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin du yang dag pa'i mtha' bar ni yang dag pa'i mthas stong ste/ de la skye ba dang 'byung ba mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
129a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye ba yin no// de ji lta ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus sos/
129b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dag pa dang / ngag yongs su dag bdung / sems yongs su dag pa dang / mtshan mongs su dag pathob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa rkyen de ris ni gar lus yongs sun/
129b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / ngag yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang// mtshan yongs su dag pa 'thob par 'gyur ba de la de ltar 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do// zhe sdang dang ldan pa rje/
129b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gti mug dang ldan pa dang / nga rgyal dang ldan pa dang / rgyu dang g.yo dang ldan pa dang / phrag dog dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang / chags pa dang ldan pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do//
129b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed cing / zhe sdang dang / gti mug dang / nga rgyal dang / sku dang / g.yo dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / chags pa dang / lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi
129b5(khri brgyad stong pa): skyed pas/ nam yang ma'i mngal du mi rtse zhing chag par rgyun du rdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i ched ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su mi skye'o//
129b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed la/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed cing / sangs rgyas kyi nong nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa
129b7(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
130a1(khri brgyad stong pa): chen pa yan tan dang ngan yon de dgazor par 'dod pasmra/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la brtson pa mi ga d+hA nga rgyan par n+te/ da d+hA drA g+hA hU~M bu kyang chu /
130a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang nye bayin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rje brgyad byung ba
130a3(khri brgyad stong pa): kun tu rtsu po spangs kyi'i'u zhes bya ste brgyad pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di ga ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chubapa/
130a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyong pa ma lags
130a5(khri brgyad stong pa): so tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// gal te gzu
130a6(khri brgyad stong pa): la rtag ces bgyi ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du bye
130a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rnam par shes pa la rtag ces bgyi ba 'am/ mi rtag ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// gal te gzugs
130b1(khri brgyad stong pa): labade zhes brtsi ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes kri bar spyod na/ mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te nor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du bye du rnamus dang / rnam pa she
130b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bde zhes bgyi ba'am/ sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la bdag ces brtsi pa 'am/ bdag ma mchis shes brtsi bar byed namangan pas
130b3(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la bdag ces bgyi ba 'am/ bdag ma mchis shes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa
130b4(khri brgyad stong pa): lags/ gal te gzugs la zhi zhes bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan mal spyod pa lags/ gal te tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
130b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa la ni nis bgyi ba 'am/ ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags/ gal te gzugs la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags
130b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gal te rong ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dben zhes bgyi ba 'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes ra
130b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas/ gal te byang chus
131a1(khri brgyad stong pa): phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la snod na mtshan ma la stod pa lhags pa/ de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ba ron/ tu sbyin pa rnams dang / rig lnga dang / ngas/
131a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar dag la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod pa lags te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa ma lags so/
131a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gal te 'di snyam du bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do snyam du sems na dmigs pa sa
131a4(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa lags te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa legs so// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gal te 'di snyam du gang
131a5(khri brgyad stong pa): de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sgom pa yin no snyam du sems na/ de mtshan ma nyid la spyod pa lags te/ de ni byang chub
131a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bgyi ba lags so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir 'di byang chub sems dpa'
131a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
131b1(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa 'di ltar gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos ma de gzugs
131b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyad pa yin te/ de ni de'i rtse ba dang / na ba dang /
131b3(khri brgyad stong pa): na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa byed pa yin no zhes kho bo smra'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
131b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gal te mig la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos// rna ba dang / sna dang / lde dang / lus dang / yid
131b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gzugs la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ swA dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ mig gi rnam
131b6(khri brgyad stong pa): par shes pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang sna'i rnam pa shes pa dang lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam
131b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ba gas pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos// gal te mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas shing kun tu shes tems/ gal rten pa dang / sna dang / kyi dang / lus dang / yid kyi
132a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dgapa la gnas shing kun tu shes kyim/ gal te mig gi 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis byung ba'i rtsor bu bded 'du drug brtul ba d+ma/ smra 'phrul babang pa
132a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bdeba'ang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos// gal te rna ba dang / sna dngaM / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis rlung ba'i tshor ba 'dra ba'am/ drug bcwa
132a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos// tshig lnga dang /
132a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mngon par shes pa drug dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang /
132a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs
132a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas shing kun tu shes te mos na/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa ni skye ba dang /
132a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rga ba dang / na ba dang / 'chi ba dang / mya ngan dang / smre sngags 'don pa dang / sdug bsngal ba dang / yid mi bde ba dang / 'khrug pa dag las yongs su mi thar zhing sdug bsngal la sogs pa las
132b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su mi 'grol lo zhes kho ngo sla'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i du byang chub sems dnga' dre ni nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis mngon sum du bya ba'i gal ba'ang med na/ de blan med/
132b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lha ga la 'gyur te de ni gnas med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems drapa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
132b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la da ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mi mkhas par rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes pa
132b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin 'ji ltar spyod na thabs la mkhas par rig par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa la
132b5(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa gang gi tshe gzugs la mi spyod// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la mi spyod/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang
132b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i mtshon ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag ces bya bar mi spyod/ de bzhin du gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang /
132b7(khri brgyad stong pa): drug bsngal zhes bya ba dang bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / ni zhes bya ba dang / ma ni zhes bya bar mi spyod / tshar ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam
133a1(khri brgyad stong pa): par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi
133a2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs stong zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces b+ha ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon/
133a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa mes ces bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma
133a4(khri brgyad stong pa): med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs dben zhes bya bar mi skyod/ mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
133a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rnam par shes pa dang na zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mi dben zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni
133a6(khri brgyad stong pa): thabs la mkhas par rig par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang gzugs med/
133a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ gzugs nyid kyang stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang gzugs yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
133b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de'ang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gud na'ang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gud mang stong pa nyid med de// rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang /
133b2(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid yin la/ stong pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa yin pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung
133b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang / mi
133b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin
133b5(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid las gud na'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gud na'ang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yin pa/ sangs
133b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang stong pa nyid yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs la mkhas
133b7(khri brgyad stong pa): par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
134a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i skal ba yod pa yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de gal te chos 'ga' zhig las len na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/
134a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ma yin no// khas mi len na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// khas len yang len la/ khas mi len kyang mi len na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no//
134a3(khri brgyad stong pa): las len pa'ang ma yin/ khas mi len pa'ang ma yin na'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
134a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ci'i phyir khas mi len pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ngo bo nyid med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir
134a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ro de ci'i phyir zhen/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po med pa'i phyir te/ rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
134a6(khri brgyad stong pa): k+Shi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni spyod do zhes bya bar lakhas mi len/ mi spyod do zhes bya bar khas mi len spyod kyang spyod la/ mi spyod kyang mi spyod do zhes bya bar las mi lan/ spyod pa'ang mam//
134a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mi spyod pa'ang ma yin no zhes bya bar las mi len to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du 'ong du chud cing ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ de ltar slob
134b1(khri brgyad stong pa): byad sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin no// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid de'ang chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mnyam pa nyid kyi/
134b2(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ste/ rgya che ba phul du bya ba/
134b3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshad med pa/ nges pa/ mi 'phrogs pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa ste/ ting nge 'dzin 'dis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
134b4(khri brgyad stong pa): po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin 'di kho nas gnas pa'i byang
134b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya 'am/ 'on te ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis kyang 'gyur/ rab 'byor
134b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
134b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gzhan dag gis gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa
135a1(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dgra gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
135a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par
135a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rje ba zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba'i rgyal
135a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyi gtsug rnam par
135a5(khri brgyad stong pa): lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
135a6(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po ltar shin tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
135a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpung bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i gnas la gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs shes bya ba'i/
135b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dgas la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting /
135b2(khri brgyad stong pa): nge 'dzin dang phyogs la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brjed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang // chos thams cad
135b3(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan
135b4(khri brgyad stong pa): zla ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dbang po'i tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snan
135b5(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brten
135b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dri ma med pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od/
135b7(khri brgyad stong pa): byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' bar byed pa
136a1(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / \u0f7f
136a2(khri brgyad stong pa): brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyi ma'i
136a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snang
136a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems gnas pa/
136a5(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin drang / rin chen mtha' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i
136a6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes
136a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting /
136b1(khri brgyad stong pa): de 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa med pa zhes bya zar/
136b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rangab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang
136b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya
136b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
136b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang spobs pa mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yongs su gcod
136b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa gcig pa zhes bya ba ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam paman
136b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bar sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par dor ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rtogs pas srid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral
137a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / brda dang sgra thams cad la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang sgra dbyangs kyi lce ge thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
137a2(khri brgyad stong pa): me sgron zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bzod pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa
137a3(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs
137a4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi blo gros shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi ba zhes bya ba'i ting du
137a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin dang / 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma
137a6(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'jig rten thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
137a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i tshul dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snga med pa dang sgra dang bcas pa thams cad yang dag par
137b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la brten pa med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de banin/
137b2(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid gnas shing sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / lus kyi skyon yang dag par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ngag gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' ltar gyur pa
137b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dag yod de/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sem/
137b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
137b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po'i ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
137b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ste/ gang la bslabs pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang /
137b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gzungs kyi sgo tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod de/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis yang 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa sha ra
138a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bu a la la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa de ni/ sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
138a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan cing / da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin/
138a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag bzhugs te 'tsho zhing zhes pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang byang
138a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung ston par rig par bya ste/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa des ni ting nge 'dzin kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // bdag ni snyoms par zhug
138a5(khri brgyad stong pa): so bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go// bdag ni snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro// zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur ba'ang med de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen//
138a6(khri brgyad stong pa): po de la rnam par rtog pa de dag thams cad med cing mi 'byung ngo // shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin de dag la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
138a7(khri brgyad stong pa): la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis lung bstan du yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
138b1(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhing / byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang /
138b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin yin la// ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin
138b3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang gzhan ma yin la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan ma yin la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan ma yin te/ ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems
138b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yin byang chub sems dpa'i nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe
138b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu des ci ting nge 'dzin de dag kun tu shes sum/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kun tu shes pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
138b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rab 'byor ji ltar kun tu shes pa med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar rnam par rtog par mi byed pa ltar ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par rtog par
138b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mi byed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir da ltar ting nge 'dzin de dag la rnam par rtog par mi byed de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na rigs kyi bu des ting nge 'dzin
139a1(khri brgyad stong pa): de dag rnam par mi shes shing kun tu mi shes so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na des rnam par mi shes shing kun tu mi shes/ rab 'byor
139a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin de dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de med pa de nyid kyi phyir rnam par mi shes shing kun tu mi shes so//
139a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor ji ltar ngas nyan thos nyon mongs pa med par gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa khyod
139a4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis bshad pa ni de yin te/ tshig de dag legs par smras pa ni legs so legs so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslab/
139a5(khri brgyad stong pa): par bya'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la /
139a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar bslab par bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la bslab par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la'ang de ltar bslab par bya'o//
139a7(khri brgyad stong pa): de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da ltar slob pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
139b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ de'ang /
139b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dag
139b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob sgra/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// de bzhin du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag la slob ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis spobs
139b4(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces
139b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das da ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyi
139b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa
139b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so// shes pa po dang / mthong ba
140a1(khri brgyad stong pa): po'i bar dag mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par/
140a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzug
140a3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos
140a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pa mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / dgra
140a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom pa nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub dang / sangs rgyas kyi bar du mi dmigs so// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom
140a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang bam
140a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya'o// sha ri'i bus gsol pa/ som ldan 'das de par slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
140b1(khri brgyad stong pa): po chos gang dag la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la'ang mi slob bo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i du/
140b2(khri brgyad stong pa): chos 'di dag ni ji ltar byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams mngon par zhen pa de lta bur yod pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i dus gsor pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos 'di dag ji lta bur mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan
140b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu ji ltar med pa de ltar yod la/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pas de'i phyir ma rig pa zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du ma mchis pa ma
140b4(khri brgyad stong pa): lags pa la ma rig pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir gzugs yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa
140b5(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i
140b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pharol tu phyin pa rnams yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
140b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bar gyi phyir byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yod pa ma yin/ nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag
141a1(khri brgyad stong pa): yod pa ma yin na/ de la byis pa gang dag ma rig pa dang sred pa gang dag gis mngon par zhen pa de dag gis yod pa ma yin pa la brtags te/ yod pa ma yin pa la mngon par/
141a2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhen nas/ 'di lta ste/ rtag pa dang chad pa'i mtha' gnyis chags pas na/ de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba ste/ de dag gis chos gang dag yod pa ma yin pa'i chos de dag yongs su brtags pas/ ming
141a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang gdugs la mngon par zhen cing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la'ang mngon par zhen to// de dag de ltar mngon
141a4(khri brgyad stong pa): par zhen pas na yod pa ma yin pa'i chos rnams la rtog par byed pa'i phyir de dag ni mi shes mi mthong ba yin no// ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo // tshor ba dang / 'du
141a5(khri brgyad stong pa): shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mi shes mi mthong ngo // khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams mi shes ma/
141a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mthong ngo // sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag mi shes mi mthong bas/ de'i phyir byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no// de dag ni nges par 'byung ba mayin te/ gang nas/
141a7(khri brgyad stong pa): nges par 'byung ba ma yin zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs kyi khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung ba ma
141b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// de dag ni ma dad pa yin te/ ci zhig lam dad ce na/ gzugs ni gzugs kyis grong zhes bya ba ma dang /
141b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nas/ byang chub ni byang chub kyis stong zhes bya ba'i bar dgal ma dad pa yin no// de dag ni mi gnas pa yin te/ ci zhig la mi gnas she na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi gnas so// tshul
141b3(khri brgyad stong pa): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la miganas
141b4(khri brgyad stong pa): so/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa lA mi gnas so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag la mi gnas pa yin te/ de'i phyir byis pa rnams shes bya'o// de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin
141b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ci zhig la mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhe na/ gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
141b6(khri brgyad stong pa): la mngon par zhen pa yin no// mig la mngon par zhen pa yin no// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid la mngon par zhen pa yin no// gzugs la mngon par zhen pa yin no//
141b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la mngon pa zhen pa yin no// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// 'dod chags dang / zhesda
142a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang gti mug rnams la mngon par zhi pa yin no// lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin no// byang chub kyi bar dag la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir de
142a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slong
142a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
142a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma yin no// shA ro'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
142a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma lags shing / rnams pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags/ bcom ldan
142a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs la mi mkhas pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtags nas mngon par zhen par byed
142a7(khri brgyad stong pa): zhin dungasam satan gyi ros tu phyin pa 'ibartson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi la rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i ba sa
142b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sa lam ngas da na pa sa kyad da /
142b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dag ma na pa na 'ad de/ nas tha chung chu sems dpa' rgyas len pa sa tshun pa su dum /
142b3(khri brgyad stong pa): zad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngam yin na// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de myur slob pa'i byang chung sems dpa' sems dang nan shes rab sti ba rab tu byin pa la rlo
