142b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ma lags shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba ma lags med/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar skyob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' se
142b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ma yin ni / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ngas par mi 'byung ba yin no// shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldanas
142b6(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags shing / ji ltar bslabs na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ba lags
142b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/
143a1(khri brgyad stong pa): yang ga par rjes su rjod / ga snyams dpa skyems dang chen sa na pas sa
143a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mnas ca mdzin pa kyang du sa pa lung // de bzhin du bas me ga nA ral tu min du da / brtson 'grus kyi ro phyin pa dang / sod pa rang rgyun
143a3(khri brgyad stong pa): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / byin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sto nga sbyin dadri ba rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs/ song dgu par rjes su mi mthong / s+yAd chub kyi bar dag mi dmims/
143a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par rjes su mi mthong / thams cad shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dkyi bar dag kyang mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su
143a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mthong na/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin te/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul
143a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung ngo // shA ri'i dus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci zhig mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das
143a7(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nges par 'byung ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pas
143b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri ste/ ci m+b+ha nA'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrubs nas/ rnam pa thams ca da/
143b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi de bzhin du/
143b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu byon pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i
143b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la bslangs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchi na bcom ldan 'das
143b5(khri brgyad stong pa): de skad 'dri ba de la ji skad bstan par bgyi/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum nu 'dun gyi bar dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la bslabs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa

144a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sang bldan nig yin rnam nam/ spyan 'ang gzhan la/ tsho dang / 'du shes dang / du bye rnams dang / rnam par shes pabang gzhan zhig yin rnam ma/
144a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ra gyur gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsa'aM pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ dz+nyA na'ang gzhan la mig kyang gnan
144a3(khri brgyad stong pa): zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ rna ba dang / rtswa dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam nAm/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la gzugs kyang gzhan/
144a4(khri brgyad stong pa): zhig yin mAm mam ma'ang gzhan la/ skra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan zhig yin mAm mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ mig gi rnam
144a5(khri brgyad stong pa): par shes pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ sna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnams par shes
144a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan nigu min mamanam/ l+h+wa ma 'jig nanal/ thig gi 'dus te rnyeg du'ang gzhan nig yin snyam mam+b+ha/ sgyuma'ang gzhanas/ rna ba'i 'dus kyi
144a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang gzhan zhig yon snyom mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/

144b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'am thug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal bu'ang ma yin/ bdeba'ang ma yin pa'ang gzhan zhig yon gyi ma mam/ rnaMm 'angag zhan la/ rna ba'i 'dus te dag pa'i rkyen gyis sbyor ba
144b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor du bdes
144b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ma thu bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma yin/ bde ba'ang ma yin pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan
144b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun po dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis
144b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ stong pa nyid kyang gnan zhig mi/
144b7(khri brgyad stong pa): snyam mam sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ smon pa med pa'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
145a1(khri brgyad stong pa): com ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sam+b+has/ sgyum 'ang gzhan la/ bzhin gshegs pa'i/
145a2(khri brgyad stong pa): stobs pa cu'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa
145a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan nig yin
145a4(khri brgyad stong pa): snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan

145a6(khri brgyad stong pa): par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/
145a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mig kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ rlo ma nyid kyang mig/ logs so// bcom ldan 'das kyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba dang / sna dang / lced/
145b1(khri brgyad stong pa): lus dang / rid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid nyid kyang sdu ma lags la/ sgyum nyid kyang yid lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyum 'angaga'anam lags/ gzungs/
145b2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ s+tha dang / dri dang
145b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chos nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chos rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gnan/
145b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ma lags/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi rnam par shes pa legs so//
145b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lha'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par
145b6(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa'i gzhan lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid ni rnam par shes pa nyid kyad m+b+ha mA lags / sgyu ma nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa lags so// bam ldan 'das smra
145b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gnan ma gas/ mig gi 'dus te nges pa'ang bad ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das chog gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rdzu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mig gi 'dus kyi dag pa lags so/
146a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang /

146a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa'ang gzhan ma
146a4(khri brgyad stong pa): lags te/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma

146a7(khri brgyad stong pa): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa'ang gnan/
146b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba 'am/ drug bsngal ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba'ang ma lags/ bde ba'ang ma lags pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags

146b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ stong pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das stong

146b6(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang mtshan ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ smon pa ma mchis pa'ang gzhan ma lags
146b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das smon pa ma mchis pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang smon pa ma mchis pa lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
147a1(khri brgyad stong pa): stobs bcu'ang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la sgyu ma nyid kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong/
147a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas
147a3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag kyang sgyu ma lags la sgyu ma nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar dag lags so// bcom ldan 'das sgyu ma'ang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad
147a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang sgyu ma lags la/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid lags so//
147a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba yod snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
147a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa yod snyam mam/
147a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems// gang la skye ba med pa dang / 'pha/
147b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur snyam mam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par
147b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du thob par 'gyur snyam mam rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// shes rab kyi
147b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ mtshan ma'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po brgyad pa//
147b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar ming drang brnas
147b5(khri brgyad stong pa): tha snyad du gdags su yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems
147b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ming dang brdas tha snyad du gdags pa tsam gyis nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po dag gi skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam par byang ba dag dmigs su yod
147b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dam rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ gang la ming dang mtshan ma med
148a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / brda med pa dang / gdags pa med pa dang tha snyad med pa dang / ming med pa dang / ming du gdags pa med pa dang / lus med pa dang / lus kyi
148a2(khri brgyad stong pa): las med pa dang / ngag med pa dang / drug gi las myed pa dang / yid med pa dang / yid kyi las med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa
148a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob
148a4(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'gyur snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
148a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pos mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar bslangs nus// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur zhing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'a
148a6(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar slob cing / blan med pa yang dag par rdzos
148a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'byung bar 'tshal bas ni/ sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bslab par bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan/
148b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das 'di ltar phung po lnga po gang dag lags pa de nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur rig par bgyi ba lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems rung /
148b2(khri brgyad stong pa): po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'thung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'thob par 'gyur
148b3(khri brgyad stong pa): snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar phung po sngo dag ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin
148b4(khri brgyad stong pa): lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de'ang dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems rmi lam lta bu'i
148b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni
148b6(khri brgyad stong pa): mi 'byung lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de'ang dmigs su ma mchis
148b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems brag cha lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag dang / mig yor lta bu dang / chu zla lta bu dang / sgyu ma wA
149a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bu dang smig rgyu lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa/
149a2(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar brag cha ni dngos po ma
149a3(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ mig yor yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin chu gra'ang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sgyu ma'ang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sdig rgya'ang dngos po ma
149a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ sprul pa'ang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin/ gzugs brnyar yang dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin lags la/ dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin de'ang dmigs su/

149a6(khri brgyad stong pa): swa bu lags te/ rnam par shes pa gang lags pa de ni dbang po drug lags shing de dag ni phung po lnga po dag lags la de dag ni nang stong pa nyid kyis dmigs su mya mchis shing / dngos
149a7(khri brgyad stong pa): po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis dmigs su ma mchis pa'i slad du'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol
149b1(khri brgyad stong pa): som ldan 'das theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dngang shing dang bar mi 'gyur lags byung bcom ldan 'das kyis
149b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du yang dag par zhugs pa'ang yin pa/ thabs la'ang mi mkhas par rig ste/ dge ba'i
149b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bshes gnyen gyi lag tu'ang ma song na skrag cing dadang la dngang bar yang 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
149b4(khri brgyad stong pa): thabs la mkhas pa gang dang ldan pas bstan pa 'di thos nas/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ba'i thabs la mkhas pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/

154a3(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid kyang chos rnams so// mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang
154a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mig gi rnam par shes pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i
154a5(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong ba ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg/
154a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa spong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang rtsong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus
154a7(khri brgyad stong pa): reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin
154b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen rjes tshor ba stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
154b2(khri brgyad stong pa): tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gis 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg
154b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / yid kyi 'dus
154b4(khri brgyad stong pa): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang yid kyi 'dus
154b5(khri brgyad stong pa): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gnag pa rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa
154b6(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid kyang dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
154b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang lam gyi stong pa nyid kyis lam stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'am nyid kyang stong pa nyid do// stong pa nyid kyang lam mo// stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
155a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyi bar gyi thong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams thong ba ma yin gyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams nyid pa rung banyid do// spong ba nga sangs rgyas
155a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rab 'byor deni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sa
155a3(khri brgyad stong pa): nga'i zangs la mkhas badzin d+ha/ zangs de dang ldanan kyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' rnon po bldan pa 'di sas nas mi rgyug mi dang ning nga bar du gyu / ra 'dzir ce
155a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang dag gis yongs su zin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na mi skrag mi dngang ning dang bar mi 'gyur bu'i byang chub sems dpa'
155a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dag ni
155a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gang dag de la gzugs mi rgyug ces bya bar chos ston// de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston sa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad maldan pa nyid ma gtogs par na zas kyi
155a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ma/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi tho ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa mitag ces bya bar chos ston// de'ang mi dngas
155b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rdza ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi rdzob ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni
155b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal
155b3(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya bar ston/ bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang /
155b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar
155b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su mi sngo ba dang / de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar ston / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya
155b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar thon te/ de'ang mi dmigs
155b7(khri brgyad stong pa): nga'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi so 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba ste/ rab 'byor da dag/
156a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i/
156a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la mi rlag ces bya bar sngon/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces zla ba dang ni zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang
156a3(khri brgyad stong pa): smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad
156a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya bar smon/
156a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / ni zhes bya ba dang / slong nas bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med/
156a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ces bya ba dang / dben zhes zla bar son te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang
156a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngob ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub
156b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan
156b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis smon cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba
156b3(khri brgyad stong pa): de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba dang / de bzhin du sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang chos
156b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mi rig ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya ba dang /
156b5(khri brgyad stong pa): mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan
156b6(khri brgyad stong pa): thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
156b7(khri brgyad stong pa): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag da la mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya
157a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bar ston/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang /
157a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dben zhes bya bar chos ston te/ da'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
157a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sngar yongs su mi sngo ba dang / de bzhin du rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba drang de bzhin du rtswa dang / lce dang / lus
157a4(khri brgyad stong pa): yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar ston sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / ni nas
157a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang
157a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i /
157a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gnyen du rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang dag de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos
157b1(khri brgyad stong pa): skyon te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyisar yongs su mi spro ba dang /
157b2(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
157b3(khri brgyad stong pa): skon cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba dang / de bzhin du mi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
157b4(khri brgyad stong pa): so sor yang dag par rig pa rnams dang skyobs rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar chos ston te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / dge ba'i
157b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rtsa ba de dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngob ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
157b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams te// de dag gis yongs su zin pa ni bstan pa 'di thos nas mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
157b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa/ thabs la mi mkhas pas sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis shing dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
158a1(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su spang nas/ dashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na skrag ste dang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di/
158a2(khri brgyad stong pa): la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing
158a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol
158a4(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang /
158a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas gzugs na
158a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs kyi slong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med nga'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la/
158a7(khri brgyad stong pa): byedang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nang stong ba zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa gyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa
158b1(khri brgyad stong pa): phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / nang stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs/ phyi stong pa nyid de'ang rmi/
158b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs/ phyi nang stong pa nyid de'ang mi dmigs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong ba nyid kyi bar de'ang mi dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / mig nang
158b3(khri brgyad stong pa): spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed
158b4(khri brgyad stong pa): cing stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid nang spong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/
158b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/
158b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang de bzhin du gzugs dang / sgra dang / dI dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams la'ang bya'o// de bzhin du mig gi rnam par shes pa dang /
158b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
159a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes
159a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de
159a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su byed pa dang / de bzhin du sbyar te/ ma rig pa dang / rga sha'i bar du nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ phyi stong pa zhes
159a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bur yid la byed/ phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa zhes bya ba'i bar du yid la byed cing / stong pa nyid de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyi/
159a5(khri brgyad stong pa): de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang / rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyi/
159a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag dang bral bas dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su
159a7(khri brgyad stong pa): byed pa dang / de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags
159b1(khri brgyad stong pa): nga'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ngar/
159b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dag sgom ning de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de/
159b3(khri brgyad stong pa): slar spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos na grag sde dngang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldanas/
159b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs po'i sug par mchis te/ sdig pa'i grogs po des yongs su zin pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos
159b5(khri brgyad stong pa): na skrag ste dang zhing dngang bar 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni gang 'di skad du/
159b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa ma yin gyis/ 'di la bslab par mi bya'o// 'di dag ni snyan dngags mkhan gyi rang bzo yin pas
159b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o// gzung bar mi bya'o// kun chub par mi bya'o// bcang bar mi bya'o// bklag par mi bya'o// bsgom par mi bya'o// tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o// gzhan
160a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dag la'ang bstan par mi bya'o// zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
160a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
160a3(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud rtsig can sangs rgyas kyi
160a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byung du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas 'di skad du/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan
160a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pas khyod la cinag
160a6(khri brgyad stong pa): byad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer zhing 'bral bar byed do// zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston cing / bdud kyi nyes pa dag mi rjod pa gang yin pa ste/
160a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs
160b1(khri brgyad stong pa): po ni 'di skar bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha drad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo'i rje dang / dbyangs kyis bsrud /
160b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i sde dang / lung du bstan pa'i rje dang de lta bu byung ba'i sde dang / skyes pa rab kyi sde dang / gleng gzhi'o sde dang / rtogs pa brjod pa'i sde drag rlon par byed/ rab tu ston par byed/
160b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par 'byed par byed/ gsal bar byed/ yang dag par rab tu ston par byed cing / bdud kyi las 'di lta bu de dag skyed par 'gyur ro// zhes de la bdud kyi las rnams mi ston pag
160b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
160b5(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni bdud rtsig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di mang du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub
160b6(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi sems cung zad kyang med do// khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa'ang ma yin no// khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar yang mi nus so zhes zer
160b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rong zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag de la mi brjod mi ston pa gang yin pa rtsa rab 'byor der byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab
161a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bskur cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu mig ni bdag dang bdag
161a2(khri brgyad stong pa): gis stong ngo // rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // gzugs ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams
161a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // mig gis rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang sde'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus
161a4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang / sna'i 'dus te
161a5(khri brgyad stong pa): reg pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis/
161a6(khri brgyad stong pa): stong ngo // rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor/
161a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bdang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
161b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag dang bdag gis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni/
161b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag dang bdag gis spong ngo // yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / spobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lAm
161b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag dang bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas ci nag bya zhes rer
161b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ro/ zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa ste// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan
161b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yang bdud sdig can rang sangs rgyas kyi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
161b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ nyan thos kyang med do// de bzhin du phyogs
161b7(khri brgyad stong pa): bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang
162a1(khri brgyad stong pa): med/ nyan thos kyang med do zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rigs/
162a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can nyan thos kyi cha byad du bskur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
162a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag zlog cing / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dag la 'doms te rjes su ston par byed do// zhes bdud kyi las de lta bu'i de dag mi rjod mi ston//
162a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can mkhan po dang slob dpon gyi cha byad du
162a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bskur zhing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang 'bral bar byed la/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag
162a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang 'bral bar byed cing dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor bar byed/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dga'a'ang sbyor bar byed/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang
162a7(khri brgyad stong pa): smon pa med pa'i chos rnams la'ang sbyor bar byed cing / 'di skad du rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos 'di dag sgoms la nyan thos kyis mngon sum du gyis shig/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
162b1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub kyis ci zhig bya zhes zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi brjod mi gyon pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o//
162b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gzhanas 'du sdig can pa dang ma'i cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ 'di skad du rigs kyi bu gang gi don du brgal ba
162b3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshad med grangs med par 'khor ba na 'khor zhing / lag pa gcad pa dang / rkang pa gcad pa dang / mgo gcad pa dpag tu med pa dag nyams su myong bar 'gyur zhing / bla na med pa yang dag par
162b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ gang la rten du zhugs pa'i 'bras du ma ngan sum du b+har yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig/ gang la dgra bcom
162b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid kyi 'bras bu mngon sum du byar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer ba'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi ston pa gang yin pa de ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
162b6(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por reg par bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du bsgyur cing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas
162b7(khri brgyad stong pa): tshig mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston/ de bzhin du mig sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan pa
163a1(khri brgyad stong pa): med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang //
163a2(khri brgyad stong pa): lce dang / lus dang / yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces rdza ba dang
163a3(khri brgyad stong pa): smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang / de bzhin du dran par nye bar gnag pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang /
163a4(khri brgyad stong pa): sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon
163a5(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya ba dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang stobs rnams dang /
163a6(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / stong zhes bya ba dang
163a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis smon pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma/
163b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dres pa'i bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / srong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces kya dang /
163b2(khri brgyad stong pa): smon bu med ces bya ba dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis smon pa'i bdud kyi las de lta bu de dag mi rjod mi snyan pa gang yin pa de ni byang
163b3(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ rig nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las sgyu maH
163b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bu'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems
163b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' byang chub sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i gzhi'i don gang lags de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/
163b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gzhi med pa'i don to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub kyang skye ba med/ sems dpa' yang skye ba med de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems
163b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' la skye ba dang yod pa nyid med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor byang chub la'ang gzhi med/ sems dpa' la'ang gzhi med de/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don ni gan
164a1(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i don to// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper nan mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med
164a2(khri brgyad stong pa): cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na rmi lam la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab
164a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor 'dis rtse/ dper na rgyu ma la gzhin med cing mi dmigs so// smig rgyu dang chu tra dang / brag cha dang / mig yor dang / gzugs bstan dang / de bzhin gshegs pas sprul pa/
164a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gno'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs
164a5(khri brgyad stong pa): so/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na ma nor ba de bzhin nyid la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// gzhan ma
164a6(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' la gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab
164a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta sre/ dper na sku ma'i skyes bu la gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du
164b1(khri brgyad stong pa): byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa/
164b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gzi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu la mig gi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba dang / sna dang / kye dang lus dang
164b3(khri brgyad stong pa): yid kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
164b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ze/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig gi rnam par
164b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa la gan med cing mi dmigs so// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / rtswa'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gzhi med cing mi dmigs
164b6(khri brgyad stong pa): so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/
164b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
165a1(khri brgyad stong pa): #byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyong nga'o gan/
165a2(khri brgyad stong pa): don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so//
165a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor 'di la ste dper na/ dper na sgyu ma'i rtses bu'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di sa ste/ dper na sgyu ma'i skye
165a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bu'i 'dugs pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bani dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la spyod pa'i

165a6(khri brgyad stong pa): so/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gzugs kyi gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
165a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa da
165b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzhi med cing mi dmigs so// de bzhin du byang chub sems
165b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med cing mi dmigs so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
165b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la mig gi gzhi med do// rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
165b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
165b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la nang stong pa nyid kyi gzhi med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi gzhi med de// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
165b6(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don kyang med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
165b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi gzhi med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
166a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'dus ma byas kyi khams la 'dus byas kyi 'am/
166a2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi gzhi med do// 'dus byas kyi khams la'ang 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod/
166a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na skye ba med pa la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
166a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'gag pa med pa dang mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pa dang /
166a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
166a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das kyi ba ma mchis pa la gang gi gni ma mchis pa lags/ kun
166a7(khri brgyad stong pa): nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis pa dang / rnam par byang ba ma mchis pa'i bar la gang gi gzhi ma mchis pa lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor skye ba med pa la gzugs/
166b1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi gzhi med do// phye ba med pa la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i gzi med do// rab 'byor kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par bya/
166b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba med pa'i bar la gzugs kyi grani med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar la tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par
166b3(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa'i gzhi med do// de bzhin du skye ba med pa la khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams kyi gzhi med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang bar med pa'i bar
166b4(khri brgyad stong pa): la khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi gzhi med do// skye ba med pa la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
166b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi gni med do// kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag gi gzhi med do//
166b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs
166b7(khri brgyad stong pa): la skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang 'byung ba med pa dang / dmigs su med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par
167a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang ba med pa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i/
167a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dod med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la skye ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang /
167a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par byang ba med pa'i bar gyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med
167a4(khri brgyad stong pa): do rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na gzugs shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'a'i chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
167a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa la
167a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// de bzhin du
167a7(khri brgyad stong pa): khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
167b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do//
167b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na la/
167b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang so
167b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag shin tu rnam par dag pa la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
167b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na bdag med pa'i phyir bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa
167b6(khri brgyad stong pa): la mtshan ma'i gzhi med do// shes pa po dang mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ shes pa po dang mthong ba po'i bar du shin tu rnam par dgu pa la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
167b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor shar ba na mun pa'i gzhi
168a1(khri brgyad stong pa): med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab
168a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na bsreg pa'i bskal ba la 'du byed thams cad kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
168a3(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la 'chal pa'i
168a4(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul khrims kyi gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab
168a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g.yeng ba'i gzhi med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab la 'tshal pa'i shes rab kyi sani med do// de bzhin ma
168a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i rnam par grol ba la rnam par ma grol ba'i gzhi med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ma yin pa'i gni med do// rab
168a7(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gni'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na 'i ma dang zla ba'i 'od la
168b1(khri brgyad stong pa): mun pa'i ga'i med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor jig ste/
168b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dper na gza' dang / skar ma dang / nor bu rin po che dang / glog gi 'od la gzhi med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la byu
168b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// rab 'byor 'di sa ste/ dper na rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang / sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams dang 'thab bral gyi
168b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / dga' ldan gyi lha rnams dang 'phrul dga'i lha rnams dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams dang / mas dang shes gyis kyi mas kyi 'ang la gzhi do// de nagags
168b5(khri brgyad stong pa): da bar rtsi 'od lag ni med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
168b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' gang yin pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i gzhi'i don gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan
168b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'ang ma yin/ dpyod pa med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thog pa med pa dang / 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa yin te/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
169a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pos chos thams cad kyi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud par bya'o//
169a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi ma mchis pa nyid la ni ji ltar bslab par bgyi/
169a3(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad ni ji ltar khong du chud par bgyibacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni dge ba dang
169a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mi rig pa dang / lung bstan du yod pa dang / lung du ma bstan pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa/
169a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas dang kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / thun mong dang / thun mong ma yin pa dag go// rab 'byor de dag
169a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos de dag gi med pa nyid la bslab par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad khong du chud/
169a7(khri brgyad stong pa): par bya ba'ang de dag yin no// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khris rtsom bam po dgu pa// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom na
169b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni/ par 'dzin pa dang / mar 'dzin par/
169b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dge sbyong du 'dzin pa dang / bram zer 'dzin pa dang / rigs kyi gtso bo la rim gro byed pa dang / sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang /
169b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang / zhal 'byed pa dang ldan pa dang / thab la lnga mkhas pa dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / 'jig rten pa'i rnam par
169b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dam pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par rnag pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par dmar ba'i 'du shes dang / rnam par bsngos pa'i 'du shes dang //
169b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes dang / rnam par 'thor ba'i 'du shes dang / rus gong gi 'du shes dang / rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang / 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang /
169b6(khri brgyad stong pa): tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / 'jig rten pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang / chos rjes su dran pa dang / dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang /
169b7(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang / gtong ba rjes su dran pa dang / lha rjes su dran pa dang / dbugs 'byung ba dang rngub pa rjes su dran pa dang / 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dang / lus su bco
170a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rjes su dran pa dang / skyo ba rjes su dran pa ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/
170a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba ni srog gcod pa dang / ma byin par len pa dang /
170a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang phra ma dang / ngag rtsub po dang tshig 'khyal pa dang brnab sems dang/ gnod sems dang / log par lta ba das/
170a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / khon du 'dzin pa dang / 'chab pa dang / 'tshig pa dang / rnam par 'tshe ba dang / phrag dog dang / ser sna dang / nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos
170a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mi dge ba rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lung du ma bstan pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lus
170a6(khri brgyad stong pa): las ni lung du ma bstan du'o// ngag gi las ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// yid kyi las ni lung du ma btsun pa'o// 'byung ba chen po bani ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// dbang po lnga ni swAH
170a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dum bstan pa'o// skye mched drug ni lung du ma bstan pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi'i lung du ma bstan pa'o// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched rnams ni
170b1(khri brgyad stong pa): lung du ma bstan pa'o// rnam par smin pa ni lung du ma bstan pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di dag ni lung du ma bskrun pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// gsol pa bcom ldan
170b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ phung po lnga dang / skye mched bcu gnyis dang /
170b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'ams bco brgyad dang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang mngon par
170b4(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa lnga dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos ma gtogs par 'jig rten pa'i chos gang ji snyed pa de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsolapa/
170b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gal/
170b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa bzhi dang yang dag par spong ba bani dang rdzu 'bru gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag
170b7(khri brgyad stong pa): brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pa dang mi shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang nga
171a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kun shes pa'i dbang po dang kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang / rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting/
171a2(khri brgyad stong pa): nge 'dzin dang / mi rtog mi dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang rig pa dang / rnam par grol ba dang / dran pa dang / shes bzhin dang / tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang / rnam par
171a3(khri brgyad stong pa): thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs rnams la blta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs la blta ba 'di ni rnam
171a4(khri brgyad stong pa): par thar pa gnyis pa'o// sdug pa nyid du mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i
171a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dus shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkhar mtha' yas so snyam nas/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di
171a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam par shes pa mtha'
171a7(khri brgyad stong pa): yas rtse mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do snyam nas/ cing
171b1(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du ni'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med
171b2(khri brgyad stong pa): min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o// de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas / 'du shes dang
171b3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu me dgu gang /
171b4(khri brgyad stong pa): zhe na/ 'dod pa dag las dben pa sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams las dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can
171b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te gnas pa dang de chog pa dang dpyod pa dang bral zhing nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge
171b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de dga' ba'i 'dod chags dang bral bas btang snyoms la gnas shing / dran pa dang shes bzhin
171b7(khri brgyad stong pa): can yin te bde ba lus kyi myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis gang de dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la gnas pa gtang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa bsgrubs
172a1(khri brgyad stong pa): te gnas pa dang de bde ba'ang spangs snga nas sdug bsngal yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba'ang nub pas bde ba'ang ma yin sdug bsngal
172a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'ang ma yin pa btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa bsam gtan bzhi pa bsgrubs te gnas pa dang de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes rnams las yang dag par 'das te/
172a3(khri brgyad stong pa): thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mtha' yas so snyam nas nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched bsgrubs
172a4(khri brgyad stong pa): te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so snyam nas/ rnam shes mtha' yas
172a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ ci'ang med do snyam nas/ ci'ang med pa'i skye mched bsgrubs te gnas/
172a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / de rnam pa thams cad du ci'ang med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das nas/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched bsgrubs te gnas pa dang / de rnam pa thams
172a7(khri brgyad stong pa): cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa bsgrubs nas gnas pa ste de dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
172b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'grub du'o// nang spong ba nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa ni dang so so yang dag
172b2(khri brgyad stong pa): par rig par ba ni dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams te de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la zag pa dang bcas par
172b3(khri brgyad stong pa): chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'di lta swA/ phung po lnga dang skye mched bcu gnyis dang / khams bco brgyad dang / bsam gratan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs
172b4(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la zag pa med pa'i chos rnams gang zhen dran pa nye bar gzhag
172b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam
172b6(khri brgyad stong pa): yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag
172b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ni zag pa med pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// rab 'byor de la 'dus byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i
173a1(khri brgyad stong pa): khams dang / de ma yin pa'i gzhan gang dag 'dus byas su gtogs pa'i chos byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa
173a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang yin te/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams gang zhe na/ chos gang dag la rtse ba dang / 'jig
173a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / gzhan du 'gyur ba mi snang ba dag ste/ 'dod chags zad pa dang / zhe sdang zad pa dang / gti mug zad pa dang / de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor bu de bzhin nyid dang
173a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings nyid dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ste/ de dag ni 'dus
173a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ma byas kyi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la thun mong gi chos rnams gang zhe na/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa ba ni//
173a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / mngon par shes pa lnga ste de dag ni thun mong gi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la thun mong ma yin pa'i chos rnams gang zhe na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa
173a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bdun dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang byar rig pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar
173b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dag ste de dag ni thun mongs ma yin pa'i chos rnams shes bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos thams cad la rtog/
173b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa med pa dang dpyod pa med pa'i phyir/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis skong pa'i chos rnams la chags pa med dang yod pa ma yin par bslab par bya'o// chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du 'o/
173b3(khri brgyad stong pa): du chud par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi
173b4(khri brgyad stong pa): btso'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi phung po chen po dang sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par
173b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur bas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi phul bgyid
173b6(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'gyur ba'i sems can gyi tshogs chen po ni gang lags/ sems can gyi ris phal po che ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi tshogs
173b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang / brgyad pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang dgra bcom pa dang
174a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rang sangs rgyas dang / sems dang po bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar
174a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag go// rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni de'i phul du byed par 'gyur ro//
174a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed de/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du 'gyur bar bya'o//
174a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
174a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar bskyed de/ 'khor ba dpag tu med pa'i sems can thams cad kyi don du bdag gis go cha bgo bar bya'o// bdag gis bdog pa thams cad yongs su
174a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gtang bar bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar
174a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o// sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang / sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan las bzlas pa med pas chos thams cad skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa/
174b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o// bdag gis sems can thams cad kyi rjes su dang /
174b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i chos rtogs pa yongs su grub pa la bslab par chos rnams tshul gcig tu bsgrubs pa bdag gis rtogs par bya'o// bdag gis chos dpag tu med pa'i bar dag bgrub pa tshogs par bya ba'i phyir
174b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa R+Sha d+ha swA du/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
174b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
174b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems 'di ltar myed de/ sems can dmyal ba dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten du gyes pa'i sems can ji snyed cig sdug bsngal gyi
174b6(khri brgyad stong pa): tshor ba myong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du bdag gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gong du sa
174b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ltar bskyed par bya ste/ bdag gis sems can de dag phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzlas par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can gcig gi don du
175a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag mang por sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o// zhes thabs de lta bus sems can de dag phung po
175a2(khri brgyad stong pa): lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzlas par ma gyur gyi bar du sems can thams cad kyi ched du bdag gis sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal de nyams su myong bar bya'o//
175a3(khri brgyad stong pa): phyis gdod bdag gi don du dge ba'i rtsa ba dag bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum du byang chub kyi tshogs bsags la bla na med pa yang gapar rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar/
