175a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya'o// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa rdo rje lta bu ste/ de la gnas nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por
175a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul byed par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems gang gis
175a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can thams cad kyi phul du 'gyur ba'i sems rlabs po che rtag par rgyun du bskyed par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che ni gang sems dang po bskyed
175a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nas gzung ste/ 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed zhe sdang gi sems mi byed/ gti mug gi sems mi byed rnam par 'tshe ba'i sems mi rtsed nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems
175b1(khri brgyad stong pa): mi byed pa rtse rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rabs po che yin te/ des sems can thams cad kyi dul du phyin par byed cing des chom sems su'ang mi byed
175b2(khri brgyad stong pa): do/ rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi sgul ba'i sems su bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi grul ba ni 'di yin te/
175b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas rlom sems su mi byed pa 'o/ rab 'byor de ni byang chung sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i sems mi gul ba'o// rab 'byor gdun
175b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i phyir sems brgyad par bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bdebar
175b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ gang sems can thams cad skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong la/ des rlom sems su'ang mi byed pa ste/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems
175b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngan pa dang bde bar bya ba'i sems so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ sems can thams cad
175b7(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rtag par rgyun du chos 'dod par bya/
176a1(khri brgyad stong pa): chos la dga' bar bya'o// chos la kun tu dga' bar bya'o// chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o// de la chos gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams/
176a2(khri brgyad stong pa): cad dbyer med pa ste/ de ni chos shes bya'o// de la chos 'dod pa gang zhe na/ gang chos 'dod cing mos pa ste/ de ni chos 'dod pa zhes bya'o// de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la
176a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dga' zhing mngon par dga' ba ste/ de ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o// de la chos la kun tu dga' ba gang zhe na/ gang chos la yon tan dang phan yon du lta ba ste/ de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba zhes bya'o//
176a4(khri brgyad stong pa): del chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ chos de nyid la sgom zhing mang du byed pa ste/ de ni chos la kun tu dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor byang
176a5(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang mi
176a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dngos po
176a7(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la gnas nasade/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o//
176b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la gnas/ stobs dang /
176b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la gnas nas/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris
176b3(khri brgyad stong pa): phal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
176b4(khri brgyad stong pa): snod pas rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' thar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang /
176b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can gyis ris bal po che'i phul du phyin par bya ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
176b6(khri brgyad stong pa): la spyod pa chos de dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang / sems can gyi ris phal po che'i phul du phyin par byed par 'gyur te/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
176b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po zhes bya'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ khrel yod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la
177a1(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag spobs lags so//
177a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya ba la khyod spobs par gyis shig/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom
177a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba spang ba'i slad du sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang / de bzhin du sems can du lta ba dang / srog tu lta ba dang / gang zag tu lta ba dang gso ba dang
177a4(khri brgyad stong pa): skyes bu dang / shed las skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / byed du 'jug pa po dang / slong ba po dang / kun nas slong ba po dang / tshor ba po dang / tshor bar byed du
177a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jug pa po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba por lta ba dang / chad par lta ba dang / rtag par lta ba dang / yod par lta ba dang / med par lta ba dang / phung por lta ba dang
177a6(khri brgyad stong pa): khams su lta ba dang / skye mched du lta ba dang / dben par lta ba dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung bar lta ba dang pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lu bad/
177a7(khri brgyad stong pa): stobs dang mi 'jigs par lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par lta ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bya bar lta ba dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya bar lta ba dang /
177b1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub tus pa dang / sangs rgyas su lta ba dang / chos su smra ba dang / dge 'dun du la ba dang chos kyi 'khor la sbyor bar lta ba dang / yongs su mya ngan las 'das par lta bzang ba'i dra
177b2(khri brgyad stong pa): du mi rigs ra'i tshul gyis sems can rnams la chos son te don dus na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes pagyi'o// de nas ni dang ldan parab 'byor gyis pacod nga /
177b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tsa'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
177b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du byed rnams dang / rnams par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang
177b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mi mkhas pas gzugs la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lnga bskyed do// de bzhin du tshor ba dang
177b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa la dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyi lha bskyed do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
177b7(khri brgyad stong pa): lta ba bskyed do// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta bar 'gyur ba
178a1(khri brgyad stong pa): yin te/ de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs la mkhas pas smra ba de dag spang ba'i phyir mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
178a2(khri brgyad stong pa): tode nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba
178a3(khri brgyad stong pa): la bdag kyang spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor khyod spobs par gyis shig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems ga
178a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bu med pa'i sems/ mnyam pa med pa'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems gang lags pa'i sems/
178a5(khri brgyad stong pa): de la'ang chags pa ma mchis pas don des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o// de ci'i slad du zhen/ 'di ltar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de ni zag par
178a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis shing khongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa lags te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa ma mchis shing / yongs su gtogs pa ma lags pa'i sems dela'ang chags pa ma mchis
178a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pas de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba'i grangs su mtsham de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i dus tshe dang ldan par 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so//
178b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ma dang ldan du rang 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen tha'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'an thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thur mong ma yin pa'i sems de gang yin radu myong /
178b2(khri brgyad stong pa): smrastsu pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po byed rkyen chad chos gangasa'ang phye ba'am 'gag par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / 'gri ba nga /
178b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phel ba dang / 'ong ba dang / 'gro ba dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la skye ba med pa dang
178b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gag pa med pa dang / 'grib pa med pa dang / 'phel ba med pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos
178b5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi sems med/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med/ byang chub sems drapa'i sems med/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang
178b6(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun meng ma yin pa'i sems so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ chu dang
178b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems zag pa med pa yongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa gang yin pa'i sems de la'ang chags pa med ces smras na/
179a1(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'ang chags pa med pa yin/
179a2(khri brgyad stong pa): nam/ rab 'byor gyis spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang
179a3(khri brgyad stong pa): chags pa med do// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du/
179a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chags pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems gang yin pa de'ang zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no zhes
179a5(khri brgyad stong pa): smras na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang rang
179a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis
179a7(khri brgyad stong pa): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing yongs su gtogs pa ma
179b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing yongs su gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam
179b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang stobs bdu dang
179b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis thong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su
179b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gtogs pa ma yin pa yin nam rab 'byor gyis spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de de bzhin te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyidakyi
179b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sems dang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong
179b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing yongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// gzugs kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// rnam par shes
179b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i bar du'ang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs
180a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing /
180a2(khri brgyad stong pa): khongs su gtogs pa ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod kyis gang 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir sems de la'ang chags pa med ces smras na tshe dang
180a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med dam/ tshor ba med pa'ang tshor ba la chags pa med dam/ 'du shes med pa'ang 'du shes la chags pa med dam/ 'du
180a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byed rnams med pa'ang 'du byed rnams la chags pa med dam rnam par shes pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de
180a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams med pa'ang byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la chags pa med dam/ sangs rgyas kyi
180a6(khri brgyad stong pa): chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis spras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// ji skad smras pa de
180a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin te/ gzugs med pa'ang gzugs la chags pa med do// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'ang rnam par shes pa la chags pa med do//
180b1(khri brgyad stong pa): khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs dang mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag pa/
180b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rig pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar dag med pa'ang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la chags pa med do// shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
180b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i semasanyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems des kyang
180b4(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlob sems su 'gyur ba med/ mngon par zhen par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o// shes
180b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ lta ba spang ba'o le'u zhes bya ste bcu gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang
180b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bos 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba la bdag kyang spobs lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka
180b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa/ gang po khyod spobs par gyis shig/ gang pos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das sems can de ni go cha chen po bgos pa lags sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par
181a1(khri brgyad stong pa): zhugs pa lags/ sems can de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa lags te bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes/
181a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyi'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sem
181a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du byang chub kyi phyir spyod
181a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ma yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te sbyin pa sbyin pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du smin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa sbyin par byed do// nyi tshe'i sems can
181a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te tshul khrims srung ba ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing tshul khrims srung ngo //
181a6(khri brgyad stong pa): nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te bzod pa sgom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bzod pa sgom par
181a7(khri brgyad stong pa): byed do// nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te brtson 'grus rtsom pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi ched du brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
181b1(khri brgyad stong pa): spyod cing brtson 'grus rtsom mo// nyi tshe'i sems can rnams kyi ched du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te bsam gtan sgom pa ma yin gyi sems can thams cad kyi ched du bsam gtan
181b2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing bsam gtan rnams skyed do// nyi mo'i sems can rnams kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te shes rab sgom pa ma yin gyi sems can
181b3(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad kyi ched du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing shes rab sgom par byed do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po'i lhag ma med pa
181b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe'am/ sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub la
181b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dgod par bya'o// sems can 'di skad cig ni byang chub la dgod par mi bya'o zhes/ sems can yongs su dpag pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can
181b6(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad kyi ched du go cha gyon no// de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang byin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
181b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyar bar bya'o// de bzhin du bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol
182a1(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o snyam mo//
182a2(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi
182a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
182a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub tu yongs su rdzo ba de ni tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan
182a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing
182a6(khri brgyad stong pa): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sa
182a7(khri brgyad stong pa): chatshacho'o/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid latu dag gis/ chos de dag la bzod pa
182b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang mos pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA
182b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ brtson 'grus ma gta gang yin pa de nibya
182b3(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshwa dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
182b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa 'di lnga ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i semasas
182b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa sbyin pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o//
182b6(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin zhing / de gcig pu la dmigs pa'i phyir chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas
182b7(khri brgyad stong pa): shing sbyin pa po'ang mi dmigs/ sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs len pa po'ang mi dmigs pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa byin
183a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
183a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ pha rol tu phyin pa de dag la mtshan mar mi 'dzin cing mi dmigs pa ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
183a3(khri brgyad stong pa): byin pa la de ltar spyod pa go cha chen po bgos par rig par bya ba yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
183a4(khri brgyad stong pa): byin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing / de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
183a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang/
183a6(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis la'ang 'dod pa med na so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci dgos pa de ni/ byang
183a7(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
183b1(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa'/
183b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol
183b3(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis brtson 'grus mi nyams mi 'gong ba gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims
183b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtsod pa rnam pa
183b5(khri brgyad stong pa): can mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems rnams kyi skabs mi 'byed cing / sems bskyed pa de'ang sems can thams cad nga/
183b6(khri brgyad stong pa): thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba da ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gas
183b7(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
184a1(khri brgyad stong pa): yid la bya ba dag gis chos thams cad la sdu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir tshul khrims des rlom sems su'ang mi byed
184a2(khri brgyad stong pa): la mi dmigs pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa
184a3(khri brgyad stong pa): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos pa
184a4(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la/
184a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin ning / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na
184a6(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtsod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bzod pa/
184a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan la
184b1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la smod pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi shes rab kyis rnam pa thams sa/
184b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yang dag par sgrub pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i rdzir byor te/ dge pa'i rtsa ba dadang /
184b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can thams cad drang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
184b4(khri brgyad stong pa): la rtsod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
184b5(khri brgyad stong pa): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa sbyin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang
184b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha
184b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bas
185a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
185a2(khri brgyad stong pa): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing / dge
185a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson
185a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'grus kyi pha rol tu pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gyi pha rol/
185a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sbyin pa
185a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
185a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
185b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i du gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas/
185b2(khri brgyad stong pa): teshes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa skam ning / chos thams cad la sgyu mas byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar 'jog ste/ de'ang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam
185b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs
185b4(khri brgyad stong pa): su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
185b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyirnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa/
185b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis 'khor gsum yongs su drag par sbyin pa sbyin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
185b7(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims
186a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan
186a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la spyod pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing de pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang
186a3(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang rmi lam dang / mig yor dang brag cha dang gzugs brnyan dang / sprul pa lta bu'i 'du shes nye bar gnas pa yin te/ de nyan thos dang rangs
186a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas shing dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang rdzun
186a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab
186a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa re re la gnas te/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs
186a7(khri brgyad stong pa): su rdzogs par byed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen don ma gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug la bsam gtan rnams
186b1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi ro myang bar mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs te/ de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skye/ tshad med pa dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la'ang snyoms par 'jug la/
186b2(khri brgyad stong pa): myang bar yang mi byed cing / de dag gis kyang mi 'phrogs la/ de dag gis dbang gis kyang mi gyi ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu donin byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs la mkhas pa
186b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par rig par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni bsam gtan dang / tshad med
186b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la dben par mthong nas gnas/ stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med par mthong nas gnas kyang yang dag pa'i ma
186b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yang mngon sum du mi byed de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs la mkhas pa'i go cha chen po yin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri
186b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgos pa la/
186b7(khri brgyad stong pa): phyogs bcu dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhig
187a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed ces ched du brjod pa tshad du rjod cing bsngags pa'ang gsung la/ ming
187a2(khri brgyad stong pa): yang yongs su sgrogs shing / byang chub sems dpa' de'i sgra rjod pa'ang mdzad la/ dbyangs rjes su sgrogs pa'ang mdzad do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
187a3(khri brgyad stong pa): glang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang yin/ gang pos smras pa/
187a4(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la sbyod cing / de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na 'dod pa dag las dben pa
187a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mi dge pa'i chos rnams las dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po rdzogs par byas te gnas pa
187a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa dang / gsum pa dang / bzhi pa yongs su rdzogs par byas te gnas pa dang / de byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur/
187a7(khri brgyad stong pa): tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ 'on med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi ma
187b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa dang / btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa rgya chen
187b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bor gyur pa/ tshad med pa mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam ma la
187b3(khri brgyad stong pa): khams kyis mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu khyab par byas te gnas pa dang / de bzhin du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched dang / ci'ang
187b4(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i skye mched dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched rdzogs par byas te gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan rnams dang /
187b5(khri brgyad stong pa): tshad med pa rnams dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang gi tshe nam mkha'i rnam pa/
187b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams kyis bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang ser
187b7(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su rdzo bar byed do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha
188a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la'ang gong ma bzhin du sbyar bar bya'o//
188a2(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad pa med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i
188a3(khri brgyad stong pa): snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi po dag la snyoms par 'jug pa ste/ gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan de dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa
188a4(khri brgyad stong pa): snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis gnas shing de bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug la/ ldang ba na nam ma'/
188a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma rnams yid la byed de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag dang / gzhan dag kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /
188a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/
188a7(khri brgyad stong pa): deni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no//
188b1(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ 'on med pa/
188b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa shin tu bsgoms pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs gcig khyab par byas te gnas
188b3(khri brgyad stong pa): shing phyogs bcu'i bar du khyab par byas te gnas pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa dang / dga' ba dang ldan pa'ang de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
188b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i sems yangs pa/ rgya chun por gyur pa/ tshad med pa/ mi gnyis pa/ khon med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ gnod pa med pa shin tu bsgoms
188b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pas 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa'i phyogs bcu'i phyogs re rer khyab pas byas nas gnas pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
188b6(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro bas sems
188b7(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa bsal ba'i phyir bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jugs pa rnams gzhan dag la rjod cing ston te/ rab tu 'tshal la rnam par
189a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byed de gsal bar byed cing / de dag gi ro myang ba dang / nyes dmigs dang / nges par 'byung ba'ang tshul bzhin du ston pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
189a2(khri brgyad stong pa): po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba de dag nyid kyis bsam gtan dang po dang / bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar dag gnon cing sgom ste/
189a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bsam gtan dang po dang bsam gtan bzhi pa'i bar de la'ang gnas la 'di lta ste/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gzhan dag gi
189a4(khri brgyad stong pa): skabs mi 'byed pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
189a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zad par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to snyam nas yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang /
189a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bzod pa dang / yongs su chog pa dang / khong du chud par byed pa dang / nye bar nges par sems pa gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu
189a7(khri brgyad stong pa): byin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad sems
189b1(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su rmo zhing / brtson 'grus kyang mi gtong ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi /
189b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ bsam gtan dang / rnam par thar pa dang /
189b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung zhing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad
189b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sem
189b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ bsam gtan dang po'i yan lag rnams dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa dang
189b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gsum pa dang bzhi pa'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang / bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang stong pa'i rnam pa dang / mtshan/
189b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ma med pa'i rnam pa dang smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni
190a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang gar/
190a2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun
190a3(khri brgyad stong pa): zlum pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa dang / rnam pa thams cad du stobs rnams dang /
190a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag sgom pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i reg pa chen po yin/
190a5(khri brgyad stong pa): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zag pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen/
190a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i theg pa chen po ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing / bdag gis sems can thams cad bsgrub po zhes mngon par gnol
190a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bar byed pa dang / snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug cing / sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang snying brtse bar nges par gzhol ba dang / dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par
190b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jug cing / bdag nyid kyis sems can thams cad dgrol bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la nges par gnol ba dang / btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la'ang snyoms par 'jug cing sems/
190b2(khri brgyad stong pa): can rnams kyi zag pa zag par bya ba la nges par gzhol bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang
190b3(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang / rtags dang / mtshan ma dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang yang rnam pa thams cad
190b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang yongs su mi spro ba de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha
190b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa nag nog med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag
190b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gis mi 'dres par gnas shing / nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa 'am/ sa gnyis po de dag du 'dod par mi byed kyi/ de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bzod cing 'dod
190b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams
191a1(khri brgyad stong pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dge ba'i chos spang ba dang / dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa mi gtong ba de ni
191a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ bsam gtan de
191a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dag dang / tshad med pa de dag dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la'ang snyoms par 'jug ste/ bsam gtan dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
191a4(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'jug pa'i dbang gis kyang mi skye la/ de dag gi ro myang yang mi byed cing de dag gis kyang mi 'phrog pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod
191a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis bsam gtan
191a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / tshad med pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la snyoms par 'jug cing ldang bar yang byed la de'ang mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang /
191a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang / zhi ba'i rnam pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi rnam pa dang / mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang / smon pa med pa'i rnam par so sor rtog kyang nyan thos kyi skyon med pa
191b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sngon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pu shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems/
191b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gnan
191b3(khri brgyad stong pa): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shes pa gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid/
191b4(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa
191b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ gdus
191b6(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med cing mnyam par gzhag par shes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/
191b7(khri brgyad stong pa): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
191b8(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang //
191b9(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang snying zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
191b10(khri brgyad stong pa): smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
191b11(khri brgyad stong pa): theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
191b12(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jugad ltar byung ba'i dus la shes pa'ang mi 'jug la de dus gsum po dag
191b13(khri brgyad stong pa): mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub
191b14(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zag pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i theg pa ni 'dod
191b15(khri brgyad stong pa): dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sngon med par yang mi 'jug pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems/
191b16(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan
191b17(khri brgyad stong pa): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid shes pa gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
191b18(khri brgyad stong pa): slong ba nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems da
191b19(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i zag pa chen po ni gang
191b20(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad la sems rnam par g.yeng ba med cing mnyam par gzhag par shes pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/
191b21(khri brgyad stong pa): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
192a1(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag ces bya ba dang / bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang //
192a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang stang zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang /
192a3(khri brgyad stong pa): smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
192a4(khri brgyad stong pa): theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
192a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la shes pa'ang mi 'jug la de dus gsum po dag
192a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub
192a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zag pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i theg pa ni 'dod
192b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug/ gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pan/
192b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'ams mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen pa yin te/ de na byang chub ma
192b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zag pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po na
192b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams la shes pa mi 'jug/ 'jig rten las las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang /
192b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la'ang shes pa mi 'jug la/ de 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams mi shes pa'ang ma yin/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang
192b6(khri brgyad stong pa): zag pa med pa dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams mi shes pa'ang ma yin pa / tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis de ni byang chub sems
192b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin te/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa
193a1(khri brgyad stong pa): shA ri'i dus/ tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zag pa/
193a2(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po la yang dag par gnas shes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa sbyin pa'i pha
193a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/ des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs byang chub sems dpa' yang mi dmigs len pa po'ang mi dmigs te/ de ltar na byang
193a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
193a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ral tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa'ang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems
193a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas la/ de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang mi dmigs byang chub
193a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' yang mi dmigs/ yid la byed pa'ang mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis
193b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
193b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems ma 'dres pas bsgom pa rnam par gcig nga'i phyir/ nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis skom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma
193b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du sgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu da
193b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
193b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa'i bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i
193b6(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul gyis sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i phyir/ stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang
193b7(khri brgyad stong pa): smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sgom ste/ de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems ma 'dres pa dag gis bsgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i
194a1(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag sgom ste/
194a2(khri brgyad stong pa): de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom mo// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o//
194a3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni tha snyad tsam du zad
194a4(khri brgyad stong pa): par shes so// gzugs dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs shes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// rnam par shes pa'i bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/
194a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di lta ste/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// mig dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di lta skye
194a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mig ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// yid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ yid ces bya ba'i bar de ni ming tsam du zad do// khams rnams dang / skye mched
194a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig par ni/
194b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang de bzhin no// nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid ces bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad du/
194b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar de ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas kyi chos dmigs su med pa'i
194b3(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams shes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// yang dag pa'i mtha' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang
194b4(khri brgyad stong pa): chos kyi dbyings dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do// sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub dang /
194b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas shes bya ba de ni ming tsam du zad do zhes bya bar shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bud ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes
194b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir/ sems dang po bskyed pa
194b7(khri brgyad stong pa): nas bzung ste/ byang chub kyi snying po la 'dug gi bar du sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang sangs
195a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi zhing na gang la gang 'os pa'i mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba dag gis/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsti stang du byed do// bla mar byed do// ri mor byed do//
195a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mchod par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid kyi chos nyan to// de theg pa chen po de la zhon te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
195a3(khri brgyad stong pa): du 'gro zhing / sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed la/ de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung / sems can gyi
195a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo // de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas te/ lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don byed nus pa de lta bu'i lus bsams bzhin du yongs su 'dzin to// de rnam
195a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par 'gyur gyi bar du nam yang theg pa de dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro// des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
195a6(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad dang / g+ha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa
195a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na shar phyogs kyi
195b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag kyang de'i bsngags brjod de / 'jig rten gyi 'ams rab 'byam ga ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na/
195b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig theg pa chen po la zhon nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi
195b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'khor lo bskor to// zhes snyan pa sgrogs shing dbyangs rjod pa mdzad do// de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang /
195b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang de'i bsngags pa rjod de/ 'jig rten gyi khams pa/
195b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ge mo zhes bya ba zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di zhes bya ba zhig rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob che/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'bar/
195b6(khri brgyad stong pa): lo bskor to// zhes snyan pa sgrogs shing dbyangs rjod pa mdzad do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thag pa chen po la yang dag par gnas pa zhes bya'o// shes
195b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi le'u zhes bya ste bcu gsum pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa bam po
196a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bcu pa// / de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos go cha chen po bgos
196a2(khri brgyad stong pa): shes bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos shes bgyi ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byung
196a3(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po'i go cha bgos pa 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
196a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos dran pa nye bar gnag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par/
196a5(khri brgyad stong pa): spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang lam gyi go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ dngos po med pa'i ngo nga
196a6(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi go cha bgos/ stobs kyi go ma bgos/ mi 'jigs pa'i go cha bgos/ so so yang dag par rig pa'i go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcob rgyad kyi
196a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ma bgos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bas khyab par byed cing g.yo bar yang byed de/
196b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems can de dag la sdug/
196b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod cing byas
196b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sgrog go// de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas bde ba dang yid bde ba thob ste/ bde ba dang yid bde ba de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de dag nas zung nas
196b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te mthong zhing mnyes par byar yod pa dang lha dang mir bye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der bya'o// de bzhin du dud 'gro'i
196b5(khri brgyad stong pa): skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas sems can rnams byung nas gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bcugs pa de dang drer sde'o// de bzhin du shar dang / sgo dang / nub
196b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang byang phyogs dang / byang shar dang / shar lho dang / lho nub dang / nub byang dang / 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag snang bas khyab
196b7(khri brgyad stong pa): par byed cing rnam pa drug tu g.yo bar yang byed de/ sems can dmyal ba thams cad kyi gnas rnams su me rab tu zhi bar byas nas/ sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal rnams
197a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rab tu zhi bar byas te/ sems can de dag la sdug bsngal rnams zhi bar rig par byed cing / byang chub sems dpa' de 'di skad ces de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
197a2(khri brgyad stong pa): drag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra rjod cing dbyangs sgrog go// de nas sems can dmyal ba pa de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas bde ba dang yid bde ba thob
197a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ste/ bde ba dang yid bde ba de nyid kyis sems can dmyal ba de dag nas byung nas/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs te mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byar yod pa dang lha dang
197a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mir skye bar 'gyur ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dang der skye'o// mir skyes nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mnyes par byed do// de bzhin du dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnams dang / gshin
197a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rje'i 'jig rten rnams nas sems can de dag shi 'phos te/ gang dang gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa'i 'jig rten gyi 'ams de dang der skye'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
197a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'di sa ste dper na sgyum mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slong ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i
197a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du sems can dmyal ba dag dang / dud 'gro'i gyi gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten mngon par sprul la des mngon par sprul nas sems can de dgas
197b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang / chos kyi sgra dang / dge 'dun gyi sgra bsgrags te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang chos kyi sgra dang dge 'dun gyi zla des sems can dargyal ba de dag pa/
197b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten nas rgyu bar gyur na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang sems
197b3(khri brgyad stong pa): car dmyal ba rnams dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag nas byung ba yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan
197b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med dpag tu med pa rnams su sems can rnams ngan 'gro gsum po dag las
197b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su bkrol yang sems can 'ga' yang yongs su bkrol bar gyur pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar gzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir//
197b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
197b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa la gnas te/ go che chen po bgos nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUR+Ya'i rang bzhin du mngon par sprul te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams be DUn/
198a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rang bzhin du mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor lo sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul pa byed do// des 'khor lo sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul nas zas 'dod pa rnams
198a2(khri brgyad stong pa): la zas sbyin par byed do// de bzhin du btung ba dang / gos dang / bzhon pa dang / spos dang / me tog 'phreng dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / byug pa dang
198a3(khri brgyad stong pa): phye ma dang / yo byad dang / gnas dang / mal cha dang bgo ba dang 'tsho ba'i yo byad dang / rtsi sman dang gser dang / dngul dang nor bu dang / rin po che dang /
198a4(khri brgyad stong pa): b+hu ru dang / dung dang / man shal dang / mu tig dang / rgyan dag dang / yo byad gang yang rung ba dag sbyin par byed do// des zas 'dod pa rnams la zas sbyin zhing
198a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyud gang yang rung ba'i bar dag byin nas/ sems can de dag la 'di lta ra/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// sems can de dag gis kyang
198a6(khri brgyad stong pa): chos bstan pa de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor/
198a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di lta rtse/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sku ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i ba ni mdor skye bo bal po che'i mdun du skye ba'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul te/ las 'dod/
198b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rnams la ni zas byin zhing / mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin na/ rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des/ sems can gang la'ang /
198b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ci'ang byin pa yod snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
198b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen pos 'khor lo sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnam la zas byin zhing / mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar du byin yang / sems can gang la'ang ci'ang byin pa med
198b4(khri brgyad stong pa): do/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar gzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes
198b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsams bzhin du skye ba yongs su 'dzin cing 'khor lo skur ba'i
198b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rigs su skye ste/ de 'khor lo skur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la 'god par byed/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
198b7(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la 'god par byed/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la 'god par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la 'god par byed
199a1(khri brgyad stong pa): cing / sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang chos ston pa de dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//
199a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i ba ni mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul
199a3(khri brgyad stong pa): nas/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod na rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma
199a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhan gyi slob ma des/ sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa yod snyam mam/ rab 'byor
199a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can
199a6(khri brgyad stong pa): grangs med tshad med pa dag dge pa bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod cing / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
199a7(khri brgyad stong pa): la bkod pa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar gzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid
199b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go ma chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gnan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/
199b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
199b3(khri brgyad stong pa): po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can rnams bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po
199b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bskyed phyin chad 'di ltar go cha chen po bgos te/ gal te sems can thams cad kyis bdag la dbyig pa dang / bong ba dang / khu tshur dang / lag cha dang mtshon gyis 'debs kyang
199b5(khri brgyad stong pa): de la bdag gis 'jug pa'i sems 'ga' yang bskyed par mi bya'o snyam zhing sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de lta bu la 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/
199b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bani mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du rtse bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar cing bkod na/
199b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des/ sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis
200a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
200a2(khri brgyad stong pa): chen pos sems can grangs med tshad med pa dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab
200a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar gzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//
200a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag
200a5(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do/ rab 'byor ji gyur na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenu po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad
200a6(khri brgyad stong pa): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas
200a7(khri brgyad stong pa): shing / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba dag gis/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do//
200b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas//
200b2(khri brgyad stong pa): lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing btsud de bkod na rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems sbru ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slong ma des sems
200b3(khri brgyad stong pa): can 'ga' yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa yod snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so//
200b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du
200b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bcug cing btsud de bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sku
200b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ma'i chos nyid par gzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//
200b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du/
201a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems/
