201a2(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi
201a3(khri brgyad stong pa): mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing chos gang la'ang rnam par g.yeng ba 'am/ rnam par g.yeng ba med par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
201a4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du
201a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// yang dag par 'dzin du bcug pa de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang bas/
201a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di sa ste/ dper na b+hU ma ma nanam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i ba
201a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/ rab 'byor 'di
201b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams du sems/ sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des/ sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing brjod de dkod pa yod sa/
201b2(khri brgyad stong pa): snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
201b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod kyang / sems can 'ga' yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
201b4(khri brgyad stong pa): la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar gzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
201b5(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems
201b6(khri brgyad stong pa): can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god par byed do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab ci
201b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'god ce na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
202a1(khri brgyad stong pa): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas chos gang la'ang skye ba 'am 'gag pa 'am kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am rnam par byang ba 'am tshul rol/
202a2(khri brgyad stong pa): lam pha rol mi dmigs so// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la gnas pa yin te/ des de bzhin du sems can thams/
202a3(khri brgyad stong pa): cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa
202a4(khri brgyad stong pa): zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/
202a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor 'di ji snyar du sems sgyu ma mkhan nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des/ sems can 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod snyam mam rab 'byor/
202a6(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
202a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can thams cad shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang sems can 'ga' yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor rgyu
202b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ma'i chos nyid nye bar gzung na / chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o//
202b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go mchen po bgos pa ni shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing ji ltar bdag
202b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud
202b4(khri brgyad stong pa): de 'god par byed do// de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bas rag
202b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du/ sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar dag yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de/
202b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'god par byed la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzog
202b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzog par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// de bzhin du lho dang nub dang byang dang byang shar dang shar
203a1(khri brgyad stong pa): @b+h+yo dang lho nub dang / nub byang dang 'og dang / steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re rer yang 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing de ji ltar/
203a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyinas pa gnas pa bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na sems can gang dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par 'dzin du
203a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god do// de bzhin du ji ltar bdag tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsam
203a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa bzhin du sems can de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing 'dzud de 'god
203a5(khri brgyad stong pa): la 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa 'di nyid kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can de dag kyang chos de thos nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon
203a6(khri brgyad stong pa): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam su ma mkhan gyi slob ma ma'as
203a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pazhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo bal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod na/ ra
203b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor 'di ji snyam du sems sgyu ma mngon nam sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug yang dag par 'dzin du bcug cing btsud de bkod pa
203b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mod rnam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
203b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shar rdzogs dang / phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sems can de dag thams cad pha rol tu sbyin pa drug la /
203b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang sems can 'ga' yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar gzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i
203b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
203b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bo go cha chen po bgos pa ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gnas shing sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed de/ bdag gis sems can
203b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di snyed cig ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i
204a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la dgod par bya'o//
204a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di skad cig ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la dgod par bya'o// 'di sbed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di
204a3(khri brgyad stong pa): snyed cig ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
204a4(khri brgyad stong pa): la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang dgra bcom
204a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o// sems can 'di snyed cig ni rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o//
204a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can 'di snyed cig ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o snyam du mi sems kyi gzhan du na de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag
204a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gis sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o// byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
204b1(khri brgyad stong pa): stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la dgod par bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i jag
204b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bul dgod par bya'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub la dgod par bya'o// bdag gis
204b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems so// rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ dpa na sgyu ma mkhan nam snum
204b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhan gyi slob ma mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor skye bo phal po che'i mdun du skye bo'i tshogs chen po zhig mngon par sprul nas 'di snyam bdag gis sems can tshad med grangs med/
204b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la dgod par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la dgod par bya'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres
204b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag la dgod par bya'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya'o// dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub kyi bar la dgod par bya'o// rnam pa
204b7(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed na rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems sgyu ma mkhan nam/ sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma des sems can 'ga' yang nga
205a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa drug la bkod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la bkod pa yod snyam mam / rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma
205a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag pha rol tu phyin
205a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bu drug dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i bar dag la dgod par sems bskyed kyang / sems can 'ga'i don gyi phyir sems bskyed pa med do//
205a4(khri brgyad stong pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar gzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid 'di yin pa'i phyir te rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po//
205a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na chos rnams kyi rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
205a6(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi skad du sgyu ma'i chos nye bar gzung na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par brdzi ba lags pa snyam bgyid do// de ci'i slad du zhe na/
205a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong mig ni mig gis stong
205b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rna dang / nA dang / lce dang lus dang yid ni yid kyis thong gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong skra dang / dr-I dang ro dang / reg d+ha dang chos ni chos kyis/
205b2(khri brgyad stong pa): skror/ mog gi rnam par shes pa ni mig gi rnam par shes pas stong/ rna ba dang sna dang lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni yid kyi rnam par shes pas thong /
205b3(khri brgyad stong pa): myig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mig gi 'dus te reg pas stong/ rna ba dang/ swA dang / lde dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni yid kyi 'dus te reg pas sod/ mig
205b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gi 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba ni
205b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bas stong / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bar ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
205b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bar gyis stong nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong / dran pa nye bar gzhag
205b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi stong / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyis stong la/ bcom ldan 'das
206a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' yang byang chub sems dpas stong go cha chen po'ang go cha chen pos stong pa'i skad du ste bcom ldan 'das rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa'
206a2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po ni go cha ma mchis pa'i go cha 'tshal bar rig par bgyi'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces pa
206a3(khri brgyad stong pa): stsal to// rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni ma byas
206a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ma bshig/ mngon par 'dus ma byas la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can dag kyang ma byas ma bshig/ mngon
206a5(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'dus ma byas pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma bgyis/ ma bshig/ mngon par 'dus ma bgyis
206a6(khri brgyad stong pa): shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po 'tshal ba'i sems can de dag kyang ma bgyis/ ma bshig/ mngon par 'dus ma bgyis pa lags
206a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byed pa po mi dmigs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma byas ma bshig/ mngon par 'dus ma byas shing / byang chub
206b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang dag gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas ma bshig/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na
206b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor 'di ltar gzugs ni mi byed mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni mi
206b3(khri brgyad stong pa): byed mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed/ mig ni mi byed mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang lus dang yid na
206b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed gzugs ni mi byed mi 'jig mngon par 'du mi byed/ skra dang / dri dang ro dang / reg bya dang
206b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chos rnams ni mi byed mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang
206b6(khri brgyad stong pa): lus dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni mi byed / mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed/ rna ba dang / sna
206b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang lce dang / lus dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon
207a1(khri brgyad stong pa): par 'du mi byed/ rna ba dang sna dang / lde dang / lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed pa'i/
207a2(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir ro// rab 'byor bdag ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed/ sems can dang / sog dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba po'i bar ni mi byed/ mi 'jig mngon
207a3(khri brgyad stong pa): par du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rmi lam ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do//
207a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ma dang / brag rgya dang / mig yor dang / gzugs brnyan dang / smig rgyu dang / sprul pa ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar
207a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor nang stong pa nyid ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de gtan med cing mi
207a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni mi byed mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med
207a7(khri brgyad stong pa): cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag
207b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bani rung so so yang dag par rig pa pani dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcod cad kyi bar dag nim/
207b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byed mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di skar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin nyid ni mi byed/ mi 'jig
207b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mngon par 'du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor de bzhin du ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin
207b4(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' ni mi byed/ mi 'jog/ mngon par 'dum
207b5(khri brgyad stong pa): byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dag gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor byang chub ni mi byed/ mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do// thams cad
207b6(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa nyid dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni mi byed mi 'jig/ mngon par 'du mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'di ltar de dag
207b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gtan med cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// rab 'byor rnam grangs des na khyod kyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma byas ma bshig/ mngon par 'dus ma byas la
208a1(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos grang gi don du go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma byas/ ma bshig/ mngon par 'dus ma byas pa yin/
208a2(khri brgyad stong pa): par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po dgos pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das bdag/
208a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 'tshal ba ltar na bcom ldan 'das gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba lags so// bcom ldan 'das tshor ba dang 'du shes/
208a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba lags so// byams ma'i bu gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs
208a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ma bcings ma grol ba zhes smra'am tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba zhes smra
208a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'am rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de de bzhin to/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
208a7(khri brgyad stong pa): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs ma bcings ma
208b1(khri brgyad stong pa): grol pa gang yin/ tsher ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin rab 'byor gyis spras pa/ tshe dang /
208b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa gang po rmi lam lta bu'i gzugs gang yin pa don ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rmi lams ngu'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rmi lam garba
208b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du brag cha lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang mig rgyu lta bu dang mig yor lta bu dang gzugs brnyan
208b4(khri brgyad stong pa): wA bu dang sbrul pa lta bu'i gzugs gang yin pa de ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// sprul pa ske bu'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang rnam par
208b5(khri brgyad stong pa): shes pa gang yin pa de ni ma btsangs ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po 'das pa'i tshor ba dang / 'du shes
208b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang 'du byed rnams dang 'das pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcing ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa'i gzugs ni me bcings ma grol ba'o//
208b7(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa gang po ma 'ongs pa'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang ma 'ongs pa'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang pod
209a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar byung ba'i gzugs ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po da ltar byung ba'i tshor ba dang 'du shes dang 'du byed rnams dang / da ltar byung /
209a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i rnam par shes pa ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs nyid med pa'i phyir gzugs de ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes
209a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa nyid med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa nyid ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
209a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dben pa dang / zhi ba dang / stong pa dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang / skye ba
209a5(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po gzugs dge pa dang / mi dge ba dang / nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa dang / nyon mongs pa med pa dang / kha na ma tho ba
209a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa dang kun nas nyon mongs pa
209a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / rnam par byang ba ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs nyid med pa'i phyir gzugs de ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin du tshor
209b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba nas/ rnam par byang ba'i bar yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i zhen
209b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa nyid med pa'i phyir rnam par shes pa de ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po chos thams cad kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos
209b3(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du dben pa la sogs pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni ma bcings
209b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ma grol ba'o// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
209b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa la sogs pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
209b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa gang po nang stong pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa
209b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gang po byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa 'i
210a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bar dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du'ang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa la sogs pa'i
210a2(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po byang chub kyang ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba byang chub sems dpa'
210a3(khri brgyad stong pa): yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste / med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// bye ba med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
210a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa gang po de bzhin nyid kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang / chos
210a5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi dbyings dang / chos gnas pa nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ma bcings ma grol ba ste/ med pa dang dben pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o//
210a6(khri brgyad stong pa): skye ba med pa'i phyir ma bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni ma bcings ma grol ba'o// de ltar na pha rol tu phyin pa drug
210a7(khri brgyad stong pa): po dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// sems can gang dag yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar 'gyur ba dngas
210b1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag dag par bya bar 'gyur ba de dag kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// bsnyen bkur bya bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
210b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// thos par 'gyur ba'i chos kyang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba'ang ma
210b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bcings ma grol ba'o// mngon par shes pa rnams dang / bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / mig lnga dang bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur
210b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bskyed par 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rtogs par 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings
210b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ma grol ba'o// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'ang ma bcings ma grol ba'o// theg pa gsum po dag gis sems can rnams yongs su mya ngan las bzlas par 'gyur ba'ang ma
210b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bcings ma grol ba'o// tshe dang ldan pa gang po med pa dang / dben pa dang / rtse ba med pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang de ltar ma bcings ma grol bu ni
210b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag gis chos thams cad mngon par rtogs par 'gyur ro// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las ma bcings ma grol ba'i le'u ste bcu
211a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'dri skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub/
211a2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs
211a3(khri brgyad stong pa): par rig par bgyi/ theg pa de ni gang la yang dag par zhugs pa lags theg pa de ni gang du gnas par 'gyur ba lags theg pa des ni su zhig nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ba
211a4(khri brgyad stong pa): lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rab 'byor khyod gang 'di skad du bcom ldan
211a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang lags shes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor pha rol tu phyin pa drug ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa/
211a6(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po yin tu drug gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson
211a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// de la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ rab
211b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis 'di lta ste/ phyi dang nang gi dngos po rnams sbyin pa/
211b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin par byed cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su
211b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sngo bar byed pa ste/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa'
211b4(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa
211b5(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bdag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par blangs shing gnas la sems
211b6(khri brgyad stong pa): can gzhan dag kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing rab tu 'god par byed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen nga'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nag nos
211b7(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis
212a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bka' stsal pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis bdag
212a2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang bzod pa phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan la gzhan dag kyang bzod pa la yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing / de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
212a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol bu bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
212a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis
212a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga la brtson par mi 'dor zhing gzhan dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa lnga yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug cing / de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa de ni/ rab
212a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin no// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
212a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ngo'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
212b1(khri brgyad stong pa): da dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis thabs la mkhas pas bdag kyang bsam gtan la sgom par 'jug cung de dag gi dbang gis kyang mi skyel gzhan dag kyang bsam gyu/
212b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug ste de'ang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed pa don rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa'i bsam gtan rtsa pha rol tu phyin pa yin no//
212b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang lagasabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab
212b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa dag gis/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad la mngon par
212b5(khri brgyad stong pa): zhenang med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la so sor rtog par byed cing / gzhan dag kyang chos thams cad la mngon par zhen pa med pa dang / chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la/
212b6(khri brgyad stong pa): so sor chog pa yang dag par 'dzin du 'jug pa de ni rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
212b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen pa'i theg pa chen po yin no// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brkyang stong pa dam po bcu gcig pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
213a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang phyi stong pa nyid dang phyi nang stong pa nyid dang stong pa nyid/
213a2(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /
213a3(khri brgyad stong pa): thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang mi
213a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yin no// de la nang stong pa nyid/
213a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gang zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams te/ mig dang rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid de/ de la ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i
213a6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir mig ni mig gis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir rna ba ni rna bas stong ngo //
213a7(khri brgyad stong pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir sna ni snas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin de
213b1(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa'i phyir ro// zer drug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jog pa med par byer lce ni skyes slong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// ther drug tu
213b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas pa med pa dang 'dzag pa med pa'i phyir lus ni lus kyis spong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang /
213b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig pa med pa'i phyir yid ni yid kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin ni de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la phyi stong pa nyid gang
213b4(khri brgyad stong pa): zhen phyi rol gyi chos rnams te/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs dang / s+tha dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams so// de la ther drug tu gnas pa/
213b5(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin du rjer zug tu gnas pa
213b6(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa/ 'jig pa med pa'i phyir sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos ni chos kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/
213b7(khri brgyad stong pa): de ni phyi stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la phyi nang stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ nang gi skye mched drug dang / phyi'i skye mched drug po de dag phyi nang gi chos rnams shes bya'o// de la nang gi
214a1(khri brgyad stong pa): chos rnams kyi'i chos rnams kyis stong pa gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir nang gi mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang
214a2(khri brgyad stong pa): lce dang lus dang yid rnams ni phyi'i gzugs dang sgra dang / dI dang / ro dang reg bya rnams kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang bzhin de yin/
214a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pA'i phyir ro// ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir phyi rol gyi chos gzugs dang sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang / reg bya dang / chos rnams
214a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ni nang gi chos mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid rnams kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te
214a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la stong pa nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi stong pa nyid gang
214a6(khri brgyad stong pa): yin pa'i stong pa nyid des stong pa nyid stong pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la chen
214a7(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir shar phyogs ni shar phyogs kyis stong ngo // lho phyogs ni lhogs phyogs kyis stong de/
214b1(khri brgyad stong pa): nub phyogs ni nub phyogs kyis stong ngo // byang phyogs ni byang phyogs kyis stong ngo // 'og gi phyogs ni 'og gi phyogs kyis stod do// gleng gi phyogs ni seng gi phyog/
214b2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis stong ngo // de bzhin du phyogs mtshams ni phyogs mtshams kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni chen po stong pa nyid ces
214b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bya'o// de la don dam pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ don dam pa ni mya ngan las 'das pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa
214b4(khri brgyad stong pa): de'ang mya ngan las 'das pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni don dam pa stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la 'dus byas stong pa nyid
214b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gang zhe na/ 'dus byas shes bya ba ni 'dod pa'i khams dang / gzugs kyi khams dang / gzugs med pa'i khams te/ de la ther zur tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig
214b6(khri brgyad stong pa): nga med pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams ni 'dod pa'i khams kyis stong gzugs kyi khams ni gzugs kyi khams kyis stong / gzugs med pa'i khams ni gzugs med pa'i khams
214b7(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis spong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ de la
215a1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dus ma byas shes bya ba ni gang la skye ba med pa dang 'gug pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa dang gnas pa med pa dang gzhan du 'gyur ba med pa
215a2(khri brgyad stong pa): de ni 'dus ma byas pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dus ma byas de'ang 'dus ma byas kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhi//
215a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la mtha' las 'das pa mi dmigs pa de ni mtha' las 'das
215a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'dzeg pa med pa'i phyir mtha' ni mthas song ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir d+ha/ de na mtha' las 'das pa/
215a5(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la thog ma dang tha'i dmigs pa de la dbus med cing gang la thog ma dang / tha ma dang
215a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dbus med pa de la 'ong ba dang 'gro ba med pa ste ther zug tu gnas pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i rdzir thog ma dang / dbus dang / tha ma rnams ni thog ma dang / dbus dang /
215a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ram rnams kyis spong ba rtse/ de ni thog ma dang tha ma med 'thong ba nyid cas rgya'o// des rar ba med pa kyang ba nyid gang rin chos ganga'a'ang gang yang dor du med pa the
215b1(khri brgyad stong pa): zug tu gnas pa med pa dang 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dor ba med pa ni dor ba med pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni dor ba med pa/
215b2(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin gang yin pa de ni/ nyan thos rnams//
215b3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis ma byas rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma byas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma byas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam
215b4(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis kyang ma mdzad pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir rang bzhin ni rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i
215b5(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir te/ de ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la chos thams cad stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ chos thams cad ces bya ba ni gzugs dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang
215b6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa dang mig dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang yid dang / gzugs dang / sgra dang / dri dang / ro dang
215b7(khri brgyad stong pa): reg bya dang / chos rnams dang / mig gi rnam par shes pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang / sna'i rnam par shes pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes
216a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang / rna ba dang / sna dang lce dang / lus dang yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang
216a2(khri brgyad stong pa): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang lus dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang / gzugs can gyi chos rnams dang /
216a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas kyi chos rnams dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya ste/ de la thar zug tu gnas pa med pa dang na/ 'jig
216a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad ni chos thams cad kyis spong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni chos thams cad stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la rang gi/
216a5(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni gzugs su rung ba/ tshor ba'i mtshan nyid ni myong ba/ 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid ni 'dzin par byed pa 'du byed rnams kyi
216a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mtshan nyid ni mngon par 'du byed pa/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam par shes par byed pa ste ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dus byas kyi chos
216a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni rang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/
216b1(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba /
216b2(khri brgyad stong pa): chos gang yin pa de dag ni dmigs su med pa ste/ 'das pa rnams ni ma 'ongs pa la mi dmigs ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang 'das pa la mi dmigs da skar byung ba rnams kyang 'a
216b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang ma 'ongs pa la mi dmigs so// ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir mi dmigs pas ni mi dmigs pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na de'i rang
216b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni mi dmigs pa slong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dngos po 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa ste/ ther zug tu
216b5(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i phyir dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni dngos po med pa thong ba
216b6(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid ces bya'o// de la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid 'ga' yang mi dmigs pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang / 'jig pa med pa'i
216b7(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa
217a1(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid gang zhe na/ chos rnams rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir 'dus pa las byung ba'i chos kyi ngo bo nyid med pa ste/ ther zug tu gnas pa med pa dang //
217a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig pa med pa'i phyir 'dus pa ni 'dus pas stong ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i rang bzhin de yin pa'i phyir te/ de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o//
217a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gzhan yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya ba ni dngos po ni dngos pos stong dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas slong/ ngo bo nyid ni ngo bo nyid kyis
217a4(khri brgyad stong pa): spyong gzhan gyi dngos po ni gzhan gyi dngos pos grong ste/ de la dngos po gang nan dngos po zhes bya ba ni phung po lnga ste de la phung po lnga po dag nI ma skyes pa'i phyir
217a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs su med pas de ltar na dngos po ni dngos pos stong ngo // dngos po med pa'ang dngos po med pas ji ltar stong zhe na/ dngos po med pa zhes bya ba ni 'dus ma byas pa ste//
217a6(khri brgyad stong pa): de la 'dus ma byas pa'ang 'dus ma byas pas stong pas de ltar na dngos po med pa ni dngos po med pas stong ngo // ji ltar na ngo bo nyid ngo bo nyid kyis song zhe na/ ngo bo nyid
217a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ces bya ba ni phyin ci ma log pa'i rang bzhin te/ de la stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes pas ma byas/ mthong bas ma byas pas na de ni ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya'o// de la
217b1(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan gyis dngos po stong pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / ma byung yang rung ste/ chos gnas pa nyid dang chos nyid dang / chos kyi dbyi/
217b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang chos skyon med pa nyid dang / de bzhin nyid dang / mnar ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' de ni gnas pa nyid de/ de ltar
217b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gzhan gyis stong pa gang yin pa de ni/ gzhan gyi dngos po stong pa nyid ces bya'o// rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po yin no// /
217b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'di lta ste/ dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i/
217b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / seng ge rnam par rtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
217b6(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
217b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / nges pa'i rgyan mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
218a1(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dngadapung bkod pa zhes bya
218a2(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang nges pa'i tshig bstan pa la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshig bla dgas la yang
218a3(khri brgyad stong pa): drag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / phyogs la rnam par blta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang brjed pa
218a4(khri brgyad stong pa): med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad yang dag par 'du ba rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang nam mkha' khyab par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
218a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rin po che sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / tshol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
218a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin dang / gnas la brten du med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sems dpa' med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
218a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
218b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / srog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'dra mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting ngo /
218b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin dang / gaN+DI brjid yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byud pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gyur ba med pa
218b3(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang snang ba dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang //
218b4(khri brgyad stong pa): snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
218b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rin chen mtha' zhes bya
218b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang dga' ba spyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting
218b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin dang chos kyis 'phags shing rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes
219a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge mnyam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang dmigs pa gcod
219a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'gyur ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i
219a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rab rib med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / g.yo
219a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang yul las brgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang sems
219a5(khri brgyad stong pa): med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
219a6(khri brgyad stong pa): stobs pa mtha' yas zhes b+ha ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang
219a7(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang bkod pa gcig pa/
219b1(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rnam pa dor ba med pa zhes byung /
219b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin dang / rtog pas sbrid pa'i mun pa thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang brda dang sba la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang sgra dbyangs kyi yi ge
219b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / mngon par ma dmigs pa zhes
219b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang bde ba dang sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
219b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin dang / zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi blo gros shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / yang dag pa dang log pa thams cad yang dag par sel ba zhes
219b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / 'gal ba dang 'gog pa thams cad yang dag par zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang 'thun pa dang 'gal ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang /
219b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / snying po dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / zla ba nya ba'i 'od dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gdung ba med pa'i
220a1(khri brgyad stong pa): glog gi 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang bkod pa chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang rnam pa thams cad du 'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
220a2(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / nyon mongs pa med par yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / sgra med pa dang sgra dang bcas pa thams
220a3(khri brgyad stong pa): cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes la bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gnas la bden pa med pa la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing sems pa med
220a4(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang lus kyi skyon yang dag par she sa nas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang / gA gi skyon rnam par 'jig pas nam mkha' skur gyur pa zhes bya ba ting nge dz+ra/
220a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang dunam mtha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing dgos pa med pa zhes rgya zang ting nge 'dzin to/ de la dnga' bar 'gro ba zhis bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang
220a6(khri brgyad stong pa): na ting nge 'dzin gang ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul nyams su myong bar byed pa ste/ de ni dpa' bur 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la rin chen phrag r+b+ha zhes
220a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i tshong nge 'dzin gang zhen/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting 'dzin thams cad rgyas bam pa don rin chen kyag tub ting nge 'dzin ces rgya// del seng gi rnam
220b1(khri brgyad stong pa): brtse ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis rnam par rtse bar byed pa ste/ de ni seng ge rnams par rtse ba nas bya ba'i nga /
220b2(khri brgyad stong pa): nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la zla ba bzang po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad snang bar byed pa ste/ de ni zla ba bzang
220b3(khri brgyad stong pa): bo zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan
220b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin par byed pa ste/ de ni zla ba'i rgyan mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/
220b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyis shin tu 'phags par 'gro ba ste/ de ni chos thams cad las shin tu 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o//
220b6(khri brgyad stong pa): de la spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyi gtsug la rnam par lta bar byed pa ste/ de ni spyi
220b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos kyi dbyings
221a1(khri brgyad stong pa): su nges par 'gro ba skye/ de ni chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang ni/
221a2(khri brgyad stong pa): nA ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi nges pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin par byed pa ste/ de ni nges pa'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la rdo rje
221a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad mi byed pa rtse de ni rdo rje rin po che zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de 'chos
221a4(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya la 'jug pa ste/ de ni chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i rtsa
221a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhen/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin rnams ca/
221a6(khri brgyad stong pa): la rgyal po'i gnas pa lta bus gnas pa ste/ de ni ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de la 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
221a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa ste/ de ni 'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// de ladang
221b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi dpung 'god par byed pa ste/ de ni dpung dkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces
