327b2(khri brgyad stong pa): grub pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gdams par bgyi zhing rjes su bstan par bgyi lags sam zhes smras so// tshe dang ldan pa shA re'i bu gang yang lhod 'di skad du ci'i phyir mngon par ma grub pa la
327b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gud na'ang / gang yang byang chub kyi slad du spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dmigs su ma mchis lags so zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang
327b4(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ mngon par ma grub pa'ang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya bar yang dag par rjes su mi
327b5(khri brgyad stong pa): mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med do// mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gzugs yang dag par rjes
327b6(khri brgyad stong pa): su mi mthong / mngon par ma grub pa las gud na tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang /
327b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs de ni gnyis su mi mthong gnyis su dbyer med do// de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa de ni gnyis su med cing
328a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gnyis su dbyer med do// de bzhin du mngon par ma grub pa las gud na chos thams cad kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ de ltar na mngon par ma grub pa dang / chos/
328a2(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad kyi bar de ni gnyis su med cing gnyis su dbyer med de/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na mngon par ma grub pa las gud na gang byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'
328a3(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs su med pa yin no// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi dag 'i lung stong pa bam po bcu bdun pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du ci'i phyi/
328a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gal te de ltar bstan pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems mi zhum mi 'gong zhing / yid 'gyod par mi 'gyur la/ mi skrag mi dngang zhing dngang bar mi
328a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags par rig par bgyi'o zhes smra zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems
328a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos thams cad g.yo ba med par yang dag par rjes su mthong zhing / chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu dang / sgyu ma lta bu dang / smig rgyu lta bu dang / brag cha lta bu dang / mig
328a7(khri brgyad stong pa): por lta bu dang / gzugs brnyan lta bu dang / sprul pa lta bur yang dag par rjes su mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
328b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa la spyod pa ni bstan pa 'di thos na/ mi thag mi dang zhing dngang bar myi 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/
328b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gang gri tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog pa de'i tshe/ gzugs las mo len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par
328b3(khri brgyad stong pa): brjid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni gzugs so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de'i tshe tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa khas
328b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni rnam par shes pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de bzhin du de'i tshe mig khas mi len
328b5(khri brgyad stong pa): cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni mig go zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de bzhin du de'i tshe rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang
328b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang yid las mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni yid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de'i tshe sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
328b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa las mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dog par mi bgyid lags so// de bzhin du de'i tshe tshul
329a1(khri brgyad stong pa): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi
329a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rol tu phyin pa las mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de'i tshe nang
329a3(khri brgyad stong pa): stong pa nyid las mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni nang stong pa nyid do zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de bzhin du de'i tshe
329a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bar du khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing / 'di ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid do zhes
329a5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam
329a6(khri brgyad stong pa): khas mi len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de bzhin du byang
329a7(khri brgyad stong pa): nub sems dpa' de'i tshe yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'dzag
329b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad las mi len cing ri
329b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dzin la gnas par mi bsrid de/ mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di drag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid legs so// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang byang chub
329b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyod pa ni/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad dang gzungs kyi sgo thams cad las mI len cing mi 'dzin la gnas par mi bgyid de/
329b4(khri brgyad stong pa): mngon par zhen par mi bgyid cing 'di dag ni ting nge 'dzin dang gzungs kyi sgo rnams so zhes 'dogs par mi bgyid lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di sngar byang
329b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gzugs yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / de bzhin du phung po dang khams dang skye mched
329b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang dag par rjes su mi mthong pha rol tu phyin pa rnams yang dag par rjes su mi mthong / sangs rgyas
329b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba'i slad du'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni ma skyes pa
330a1(khri brgyad stong pa): snyed gzugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags pa'i slad du'o// de ltar na gzugs dang skye ba ma mchis pa de gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis
330a2(khri brgyad stong pa): su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skar bye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang ba ma lags pa'i rmad du'o// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang //
330a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i bye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so// mig gi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni mig ma lags so//
330a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni yid ma lags so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i
330a5(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
330a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags pa'i slad du'o// de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / skye ba ma
330a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so// dngos po med pa'i
330b1(khri brgyad stong pa): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid thong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang skye ba ma
330b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags bden dran pa nye bar gzhag
330b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / rtse ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de bzhin du yang dag
330b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bar slong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / mi 'dzegs pa rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang /
330b5(khri brgyad stong pa): stobs bcu dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags/
330b6(khri brgyad stong pa): te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang rtse ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ni'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar sangs
330b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma lags pa'i slad du'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar de bzhin nyid ni ma skyes pa ste/
331a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags te de ltar na de bzhin nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis
331a2(khri brgyad stong pa): su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste de'i slad du de bzhin
331a3(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma lags so// ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang / gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos nyid dang chos kyi dbyings dang /
331a4(khri brgyad stong pa): chos gnas pa nyid dang // chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag pa'i mtha' dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni bsnam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyis
331a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ma lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ 'di ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis pa'i slad du'o// bcom
331a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sman 'das byang chub dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
331a7(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar skye ba ma mchis pa ni gcig ma lags/
331b1(khri brgyad stong pa): mang po ma lags pa'i slad du rnye de'i slad du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang / skye ba ma mchis pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags bcom ldan 'as/
331b2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ltar gzugs ni mi rtag pa ste/ gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa
331b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags te/ de ltar na phung po dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhen bcom
331b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du'o// khams dang / skye mched rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni khams dang / skye mched
331b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na khams dang/ skye mched rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// bcom ldan 'das smin pa'i
331b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyar ma
331b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis lags so// de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin
332a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags te/ de ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'gris
332a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slang du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ni/
332a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa
332a4(khri brgyad stong pa): nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na nang stong pa nyid dang 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni
332a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma lags so// de bzhin du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
332a6(khri brgyad stong pa): bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma lags te/ de ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma
332a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'grib pa gang
332b1(khri brgyad stong pa): lags pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na
332b2(khri brgyad stong pa): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis 'gas so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skar 'grib pa ni gcig ma lags/
332b3(khri brgyad stong pa): mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma lags so// yang dag par spong ba rnams dang
332b4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni la
332b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ma lags te/ de ltar na lam dang 'grub pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma la/
332b6(khri brgyad stong pa): mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du lam gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni lam ma lags so// de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang
332b7(khri brgyad stong pa): dag par rig pa rnams dang / skabs bcu dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de dag ni sangs rgyas kyis chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags te/ de ltar na sangs rgyas
333a1(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi chos mA 'dres bu rnams dang / 'grib pa de ni gnyis su ma mchis shing gnyis su dbyer ma mchis lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar 'grib pa ni gcig ma/
333a2(khri brgyad stong pa): lags/ mang po ma lags pa'i slad du ste/ de'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma lags so// bcom ldan
333a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das gang yang gzugs shes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so// de bzhin du gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa
333a4(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so// gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags
333a5(khri brgyad stong pa): so/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong pa las/ gnyis su med pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu pa'o// / de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab
333a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos 'di dag la ni ji ltar nye bar rtog/ tshe dang
333a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin/ nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang khyod 'di skad
333b1(khri brgyad stong pa): du byang chub sems dpa' ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub gang yin pa nyid sems dpa' yin pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o// byang chub des kyang
333b2(khri brgyad stong pa): chos thams cad kyi rnam pa shes te/ chos de dag la mngon par zhen pa'ang med do// chos gang dag gi rnam pa shes she na/ gzugs kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do//
333b3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang rnam par shes pa'i rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do// de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye mched
333b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / re ni cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do// stobs rnams dang / mi 'dzi
333b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam pa shes te/ de la'ang mngon par zhen pa med do// shA ri'i bus smras pa
333b6(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa gang dag dang / rtags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis chos
333b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams 'dzin pa se/ 'dis ste/ rnam pa gang dag dang / chags gang dag dang / mtshan ma gang dag gis 'dus byas dang / 'dul byas kyi chos rnams sam// gzugs rnams sam/ tha rnams
334a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sam dri rnams sngam ro rnams sam/ reg bya rnams sam/ chos rnams sum/ nang dang phyi'i chos rnams su 'dzin pa skye/ de ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya/
334a2(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song ba ste//
334a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// gang las ring du song zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phung po rnams dang / khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing
334a4(khri brgyad stong pa): 'brel par 'byung ba las ring du song / nyon mongs pa thams cad dang / lta bar mur pa thams cad las ring du song / 'gro ba drug las ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o//
334a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa las/
334a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o// nang stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o//
334a7(khri brgyad stong pa): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
334b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o// stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang
334b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / spangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad po dag las ring du song ba skye/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyi 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o// rnam pa thams
334b3(khri brgyad stong pa): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar las ring du song ba ste/ de'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ring du song ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ 'di lta ste/ shes
334b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang khyod 'di skad du nye bar rtog pa ni gang yin zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub se
334b5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya bar/
334b6(khri brgyad stong pa): nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs stong zhes bya ba dang /
334b7(khri brgyad stong pa): mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// gzugs smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya bar te/
335a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bar mi rtog go// gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bur mi rtog go// de bzhin du tshor ba dang 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
335a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang / me rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa bde skyes bya ba dang / sdug 'phrul zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa bdag
335a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang / rdzi stong zhes bya
335a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bar nye bar mi rtog go/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya b.ranye
335a5(khri brgyad stong pa): bar mi rtog go// rnam par shes pa dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go/ de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa
335a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang / mi chag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtag /
335a7(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin du sbyar te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma 'i zhes bya ba dang /
335b1(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyong zhes bya ba dang / mi skyong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod ces bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dben zhes bu ba dang //
335b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mi dben zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyar te/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du
335b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya ba nye bar mi rtog go// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong zhes bya ba dang / mi stong zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// dben zhes bya ba dang / mi dben zhes bya
335b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'i bar du nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// de bzhin du sbyar te/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang /
335b5(khri brgyad stong pa): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi
335b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid chag
335b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ces bya ba dang / mi rtag ces bya bar nye bar mi rtog go// bde zhes bya ba dang / sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang / bdag ces bya ba dang / bdag med ces bya ba dang / zhi zhes bya ba dang / ma zhi zhes bya ba dang /
336a1(khri brgyad stong pa): sdong zhes bya ba dang / mi skyong zhes bya ba dang / mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang / mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang / smon pa yod nus bya ba dang / smon pa med ces bya ba dang / dan/
336a2(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes bya ba dang / mi dbyen zhes khar nye bar mi rtog ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni// chos de dag la de ltar nye bar
336a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rtog par byed do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni gzugs ma lags so//
336a4(khri brgyad stong pa): tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so// de bzhin du 'ams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rkyen
336a5(khri brgyad stong pa): cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so
336a6(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ma/
336a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mchis pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags so zhes smra/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ro'i
336b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bu gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin pa te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshe dang /
336b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ngo // tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa
336b3(khri brgyad stong pa): de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA
336b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa
336b5(khri brgyad stong pa): shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam ka tan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin/
336b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ngo // shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grang
336b7(khri brgyad stong pa): des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ngo // nang stong pa nyid kyi
337a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gang yin pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te rtse ba med do// dngos po med pa'i ngan nyid kyi ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyis snong ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong /
337a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi skye ba mang/
337a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa gang yin pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyis stong ngo // dran pa nye bar gnas
337a4(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rnams kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do// tshe dang ldan shA ri'i bu de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dbang po dang /
337a5(khri brgyad stong pa): spongs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs kyi sgo dang / sa@
337a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rdzas kyi chos dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ngo // rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad
337a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te rtse ba med do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// shA ri
337b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir khyod 'di skad du 'di ltar gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de gzugs ma lags so// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed nams dang /
337b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma lags so// de bzhin du khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / stong pa nyid dang / byang chub kyi
337b3(khri brgyad stong pa): phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang /
337b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang lags pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma lags shes zer/ rab 'byor gyis sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'gro
337b5(khri brgyad stong pa): pa gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa dang / 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes
337b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/
337b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong
338a1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa nyid thams dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa
338a2(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang de bzhin te/ de ltar na 'grib pa gang yin pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa dang / gnyis su dbyer med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad sdang
338a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing / gzugs med pa bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
338a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no// tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa
338a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ma yin no// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
338a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ci'i phyir khyod 'dri skad du/ gang yang gzugs shes bgyi ba ra ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so// de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang
338a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa zhes bgyi ba de ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su bgyis pa lags so// gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bgyi ba'i bar de'ang gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su
338b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyis pa lags so// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di skar skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin la/ gzugs kyang gzhan ma yin te/ rtse ba med pa nyid kyang gzugs so/
338b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs nyid kyang skye ba med pa'o// bye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin la/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid
338b3(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam par shes pa'o// rnam par shes pa nyid kyang skye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs res na gang yang gzugs shes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i mangs su byas pa yin na/
338b4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang yang tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no// khams dang / skye mched rnams dang
338b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang shAmi 'jigs pa rnams dang /
338b6(khri brgyad stong pa): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang de bzhin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan ma yin la/
338b7(khri brgyad stong pa): skye ba med pa'ang gzhan ma yin te/ skye ba med pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang phye ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des
339a1(khri brgyad stong pa): na gang yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya ba de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gatshe dang ldan pa
339a2(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos de dag la de ltar nye bar rtog par
339a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bgyid pa de'i tshe/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad dugazugs kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag po'i slad du/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams
339a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dbang rnam par shes pa'i rgya ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ bdag gi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ sems can
339a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang srog dang / gso ba dang / skyes bu dang / gang zag dang / shed lus skyes dang / shed bu dang / byed pa po dang / tshor ba po dang / shes pa po dang / mthong ba ba'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong
339a6(khri brgyad stong pa): lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rtse ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad/
339a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rung byen pa'i pha rab tu phyin pa'i gyi ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// de bzhin du gan tu rnam par dag pa'i slang du/ tshu thams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / 'bod pa'i mal phyin pa dang /
339b1(khri brgyad stong pa): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/
339b2(khri brgyad stong pa): nang stong pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi skye ba mya mchis pa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par
339b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dag pa'i slad du/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ yang dag par spong ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / rang
339b4(khri brgyad stong pa): bo dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / lam dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa dang / gzungs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo dang / sangs
339b5(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so'i bye bo'i rtse ba ma mchis pa
339b6(khri brgyad stong pa): mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang /
339b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang /
340a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams /
340a2(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi gyi ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi skye ba ma mchis pa mthong lags so// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis spras pa'i/
340a3(khri brgyad stong pa): don kho bos shes pa ltar na gzugs ni skye ba med pa yin/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa'ang rtse ba med pa yin/ khams rnams skye ba med pa yin/ skye
340a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mched rnams skye ba med pa yin/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba skye ba med pa yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa yin/ stong pa nyid thams cad skye ba med pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs
340a5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun skye ba med pa yin/ ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams skye ba med pa yin/ stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa
340a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad skye ba med pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang rtse ba med pa yin/ so sa'i sgo bo'ang skye ba med pa yin pas so'i phye ba'o chos
340a7(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams kyang bye ba med pa yin/ rgyun du zhugs pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i chos rnams dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang /
340b1(khri brgyad stong pa): mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang / dgra bcom pa dang / dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' dang / zung
340b2(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang skye ba med pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te gzugs kyang skye ba med la
340b3(khri brgyad stong pa): sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar du'ang skye ba med pa yin na ni/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor nyan thos kyis kyang nyan thos kyi byang chub thob zin par mi 'gyur ram/ de bzhin du so so'i skye bos kyang
340b4(khri brgyad stong pa): rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub dang / de bzhin du byang chub sems dpas kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par mi 'gyur ram/ 'gro ba rnam pa lnga'ang tha dad par med par 'gyur ro//
340b5(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa byang chub rnam pa lnga'ang thob zin par 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad skye ba med pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rgyun du bzhugs
340b6(khri brgyad stong pa): bas ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ lan cog phyir 'ong bas ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug bslab pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ phyir mi 'ong
340b7(khri brgyad stong pa): khas ni tha ma'o cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya ba dgra bcom pas ni gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spang ba'i phyir lam bsgom par bya
341a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis ni rang byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir lam sgom par bya/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams
341a2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi ched du dka' ba spyad pa spyod cing / sdug bsngal gang yin pa de dag nyams su myong bar byed/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis
341a3(khri brgyad stong pa): ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
341a4(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni chos ma skyes pa la 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa yod par mi 'dod do// kho bo ni ma skyes pa la rgyun du zhugs pa nyid yod par mi 'dod do//
341a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod par mi 'dod do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
341a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dgra bcom pa nyid dang / dgra bcom pa nyid kyi 'bras bu dang skye ba med pa la rang byang chub dang rang sangs rgyas yod par mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni byang chub
341a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' dka' ba spyad pa spyod par mi 'dod do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang dka' ba'i 'du shes kyis mi spyod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra
341b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'di sngar dka' ba'i 'du shes la gnas pas ni sems can du dag tu med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par mi nus pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'on kyang bar 'du shes
341b2(khri brgyad stong pa): bskyed pa dang / mar 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bur 'du shes bskyed pa dang / bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pas sems can dpag tu med/ glang med pa rnams kyi don byed par nus so// tshe dang ldan pa/
341b3(khri brgyad stong pa): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ ji ltar bdug bdag ces bya'ang de ni thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad/
341b4(khri brgyad stong pa): du med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du/ phyi dang nang gi chos rnams la'ang de ltar sems bskyed par bya'o// gal te de lta bu'i 'du shes bskyed par 'gyur na/ dka' ba'i 'du shes skyed par mi 'gyur ro// de
341b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du chos 'ga' yang mi len cing mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan
341b6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni skye ba med pa la de bzhin gshegs pa yod par mi 'dod do// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yod par mi 'dod do// chos ma skyes
341b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pas kyang thob par bya ba ma skyes pa 'thob par mi 'dod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa skyes pa thob pa ma 'on te chos
342a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bye bas 'thob pa ma gyes pa 'thob/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni skyes pa'i chos kyis 'thob pa ma skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod/ ma skyes pa'i chos/
342a2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis thob par bya ba skyes pa 'thob par yang mi 'dod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci 'thob pa'ang med la mngon par rtogs pa'ang med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
342a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa shA ri'i bu 'thob pa'ang yod/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang yod de gnyis kyi tshul gyis ni ma yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa dag ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis
342a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gdags pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs
342a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis dgas pa yin te/ don dam par ni 'thob pa'ang med mngon par rtogs pa'ang med/ rgyun du zhugs pa'ang med lan cig phyir 'ong ba'ang med/ phyi/
342a6(khri brgyad stong pa): mi 'ong ba'ang med/ dgra bcom pa'ang med/ rang sangs rgyas kyang med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang med/ sangs rgyas kyang med do// shA ri'i bus sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
342a7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa ji ltar 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa bzhin du
342b1(khri brgyad stong pa): za med pa'ang de sa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na skye ba'ang mi skye la daskye ba med pa'ang mi bya'o//
342b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod par khyod spobs sam/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med pa'ang brjod par
342b3(khri brgyad stong pa): spobs sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos ma skyes so chos ma skyes so zhes bya bar brjod par khyod spobs sam zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu chos ma skyes so chos ma
342b4(khri brgyad stong pa): skyes so zhes bya bar brjod pa'i spobs pa'adra kho bo la med do// chos ma skyes pa rnams kyi skye ba med par brjod pa'i spobs pa'ang kho bo la med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di/
342b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar chos ma skyes pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa gang yin pa dang / spobs pa gang yin pa dang / brjod pa gang yin pa dang / mi bye ba gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa
342b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin zhing / gzugs can ma yin pa/ bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/
342b7(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor brjod pa'ang skye ba med/ spobs pa'ang skye ba med/ ches kyang skye ba med de/ yang dag las brtsams te brjod par bya ba'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis
343a1(khri brgyad stong pa): smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ brjod pa ni skye ba med pa'o// spobs pa ni skye ba med pa'o// chos ni skye ba med pa'o// gang dag las brnams te brjod par spobs
343a2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gzugs skye ba meng pa dang / tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang /
343a3(khri brgyad stong pa): skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
343a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang skye ba med pa dang /
343a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du'ang skye ba med pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor re de bzhin te/ brjod pa skye ba med do// spobs pa skye ba med do// chos skye/
343a6(khri brgyad stong pa): ba med do// gang dag las brtsams te brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba med do// phung po dang / khams dang / skye mched dang / rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin
343a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang // gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa
343b1(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / sa so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du skye ba med do// de bzhin du sbyar te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du phye 'a med/
343b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ro// de ltar na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis 'gro ba lnga po dag tha dad pa yin gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ tshong
343b3(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji ltar thob pa dang / mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha skad du yod pa de bzhin du/ 'gro ba lnga po dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis tha dad kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no//
343b4(khri brgyad stong pa): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar don dam par ni las kyi rnam par smin pa'ang med/ skye ba'ang med/ 'gag pa'ang med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'ang med/ rnam par byung
343b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ba'ang med pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras phra/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci chos ma skyes pa skye 'am/ 'on te chos skyes pa ste/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni chos
343b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ma skyes pa skye bar yang mi 'dod la/ chos skyes pa skye bar yang mi 'dod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor khyod chos ma skyes pa gang skye bar mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/
343b7(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni gzugs ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do// kho bo ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ma skyes pa skye bar mi 'dod do// dang/
344a1(khri brgyad stong pa): du khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang / stong pa nyid
344a2(khri brgyad stong pa): thams cad dang / stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang / byang chub ma skyes pa 'thob par mi
344a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'dod do// mngon par rtogs par mi 'dod do// shA ri'i bus sbas pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos skyes pa gang skye bur mi 'dod/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tsha
344a4(khri brgyad stong pa): ni gzugs skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa nyid skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo ni tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skyes pa ngo bo nyid
344a5(khri brgyad stong pa): kyis stong pa nyid skye bar mi 'dod do// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du sbyar te/ kho bo ni byang chub kyi bar du skyes pa ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa skye bar mi 'dod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/
344a6(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci skye ba med pa'i chos skye 'am/ skye ba'i chos skye/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu skye ba med pa'ang mi skye la/ skye ba'ang mi skye'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
344a7(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar skye ba gang yin pa dang / skye ba med pa'i chos gang yin pa de gnyis ka'ang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ skye ba med pa'i phyir ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
344b1(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs rtse ba med pa dang / tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa skye ba med pa dang / de bzhin du khams rnams dang / skye/
344b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
344b3(khri brgyad stong pa): cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / stobs bcu dang / mi 'dzegs pa bzhi dang / so so yang slar rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad dang / de bzhi
344b4(khri brgyad stong pa): du sbyar te/ lus kyi 'du byed rnams dang / ngag gi 'du byed rnams dang / yid kyi 'du byed rnams dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
344b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bu rnam grangs nges na brjod pa skye ba myed/ spongs pa skye ba med/ chos skye ba mang / gang dag les brtsams te brjod par spobs pa'i chos de dag kyang skye ba meng do// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
344b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor ni chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog tu bzhag pa'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni gang dang gang yongs su dris pa de dang de nyid las nges par 'byung ba'i phyir ro//
344b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ 'di ltar chos thams cad la mi gnas pa'i phyir ro// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ji ltar na chos thams cad la mi gnas pa yin/ rab 'byor
345a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs /
345a2(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par
345a3(khri brgyad stong pa): yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mig ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan
345a4(khri brgyad stong pa): shA ri'i bu de bzhin du rna ba dang / sna dang / lce dang / lus dang / yid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/
345a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa shA r-i'i bu gzugs ni radu bzhin gyis stod ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ d+hi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu m+b+ha dang / dri dang / 'o
345a6(khri brgyad stong pa): reg bya dang / chos rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ da ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang
345a7(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol/
345b1(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni rang bzhin gyis song rtse/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/
345b2(khri brgyad stong pa): gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so/
345b3(khri brgyad stong pa): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang me gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang
345b4(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// de bzhin du yang dag par
345b5(khri brgyad stong pa): ba rnams dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang / dbang po rnams dang / stobs rnams dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang / lam ni rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de dag ni nang na'ang mi
345b6(khri brgyad stong pa): gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// stobs rnams dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams dang // so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
345b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ni rang bzhin gyis gong ste/ de dag ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad
346a1(khri brgyad stong pa): mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rang bzhin gyis skyong ste/ de ni nang na'ang mi gnas/ phyi rol na'ang mi gnas/ gnyis ka med par yang mi dmigs te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam
346a2(khri brgyad stong pa): grangs des na chos thams cad ni rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i phyir mi gnas pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pas
346a3(khri brgyad stong pa): gzugs yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// tsher ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// khams rnams dang / skye mched rnams dang / rten
346a4(khri brgyad stong pa): cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dang / pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum nu rtsa bdun dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / gzungs kyi sgo
346a5(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams dang / stobs bcu dang / mau 'jigs pa rnams dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// rnam
346a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// shA ri'i bu su smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pa rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod paji
346a7(khri brgyad stong pa): ltar byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong bar byed/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod do//
346b1(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
346b2(khri brgyad stong pa): byin pa ni 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod do// shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nis ge/ 'jig rten las
346b3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das pa ni gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di lta byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa po dang sbyin bdag tu gyur cing / dge sbyong
346b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang bram ze dang / bzin pa dang / sdug 'phongs pa dang / 'gron pa dang / slongs mo pa zas 'dod pa rnams la ni zas/ skom 'dod pa rnams la ni skom bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la ni
346b5(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams la ni gos/ me tog 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog/ me tog 'phreng 'dod pa rnams la ni me tog 'phreng spos 'dod pa rnams la ni spos byug pa 'dodapa
346b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnams la ni byug pa/ gnas 'dod pa rnams la ni gnas mal cha dang stan 'dod pa rnams la ni mal cha dang stan/ 'tshog chas 'dod pa rnams la ni 'chog chas/ sman 'dod pa rnams la ni
346b7(khri brgyad stong pa): sman dang / mi'i yo byad gang yang rung ba'i bar dag sbyin par byed cing / bu 'dod pa rnams la ni ru sbyin par byed/ bu mo 'dod pa rnams la ni bu mo sbyin par byed/ chung ma 'dod pa rnams la ni
347a1(khri brgyad stong pa): chung ma sbyin par byed/ rgyal srid 'dod pa rnams la ni rgyal srid sbyin par byed/ mgo 'dod pa rnams la ni mgo sbyin par byed/ mig 'dod pa rnams la ni mig sbyin
347a2(khri brgyad stong pa): par byed/ yan lag dang nying lag 'dod pa rnams la ni yan lag dang nying lag sbyin par byed/ shA dang / khrag dang / rkang 'dod pa rnams la ni sha dang / khrag dang / rkang sbyin par byed pa/
347a3(khri brgyad stong pa): de la'ang gnas shing yongs su gtong bar byed de/ de 'di snyam du bdag ni sbyin pa byed pa'o// 'di ni len pa'o// 'di ni sbyin pa'o// bdag ni ser sna med pa'o// bdug ni sbyin
347a4(khri brgyad stong pa): bdag go// bdag ni bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba'o// bdag ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o// bdag ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o snyam du sems shing //
347a5(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin pa de'ang byin nas dmigag pa'i tshul gyis sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing / bdag gi sbyin pa'i 'bras bu 'dis sems can 'di dag tshe 'di la'ang bde bar 'gyur zhing / na/
347a6(khri brgyad stong pa): pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar gyur cig ces/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su spo bar byed do// de ni chags pa gsum la chags shing sbyin pa smin par byed /
347a7(khri brgyad stong pa): gsum gang zhe na/ 'di sa ste/ bdag tu 'du shes pa dang / gzhan du 'du shes pa dang / sbyin par 'du shes paste/ chags pa gsum po de dag la chags shing sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de ni
347b1(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir 'jig rten pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ 'di ltar 'jig rten las mi g.yo mi 'phags cing mi 'da' ste/ de'i phyir 'jig rten
347b2(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa'o// de la 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa
347b3(khri brgyad stong pa): gang nan/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin po sbyin pa na/ bdag tu mi dmigs/ len par mi dmigs/ sbyin par mi dmigs shing / de de'i rnam par
347b4(khri brgyad stong pa): smin pa la mngon par dga' ba med pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i du de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa yin no// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
347b5(khri brgyad stong pa): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa sbyin pa na/ sbyin pa de sems can thams cad la snyoms par byed kyang / sems can thams cad kyang mi dmigs/ bdag kyang mi dmigs
347b6(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin pa'ang mi dmigs la/ sbyin pa de'ang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed cing / byang chub kyang mi dmigs pa de ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'jig rten las
347b7(khri brgyad stong pa): 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar 'jig rten las g.yo zhing
348a1(khri brgyad stong pa): gas pa dge ma tshan pa nga/ 'os
348a2(khri brgyad stong pa): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang de bzhin no// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa khri brgyad stong ba bam po bco brgyad/
348a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang 'jig rten pa'ang yod/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'ang yod de/ de la 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/
348a4(khri brgyad stong pa): gang zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdag gis ser sna'i sems tshar bcad do zhes dmigs pa la gnas nas sbyin pa sbyin par byed de/ de yang bdag
348a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dang / sems can dang / sbyin pa'i 'du shes la gnas shing / de bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ste/ dmigs pa la gnas nas phyi dang nang gi dngos po 'am/ zin pa dang / ma zin pa
348a6(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ci bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba dang / de sbyangs pa'i yon tan la gnas shing lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi dmigs pa la gnas te/ bdag tu lta ba la gnas
348a7(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can du lta ba dang / dge bar lta ba la gnas shing / tshul khrims dang / dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam de dag la brten la/ tshul khrims dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
348b1(khri brgyad stong pa): shing byang chub dmigs nas dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / de bdag la bstod cing gzhan la smod la bdag dang / sems can dang / bzod par lta ba la gnas shing /
348b2(khri brgyad stong pa): sems can thams cad kyis nyes par byas pa bzod par byed la/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
348b3(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / de lus dmigs shing bsod nams kyi tshogs dmigs la ye shes kyi tshogs dmigs shing bdag dmigs la/ sems can rnams dmigs
348b4(khri brgyad stong pa): byang chub dmigs shing brtson 'grus rtsom ste/ de brtson 'grus rtsom pa des rlom sems su byed pa dang / de byams pa dang / snying rje dang / dga' ba dang / btang snyoms sgom par byed
348b5(khri brgyad stong pa): cing / bsam gtan rnams dang / mngon par shes pa rnams dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la'ang snyoms par 'jug la ldang bar byed cing / de dag gi
348b6(khri brgyad stong pa): ro myong bar yang byed la/ de dag gis rlom sems su'ang byed cing / dmigs pa'i lta ba can du gyur nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing byang
348b7(khri brgyad stong pa): chub tu yongs su sngo ba de ni 'jig rten pa'i 'o// de gzugs stong ngo zhes bya bar dmigs/ tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa stong ngo zhes bya bar
349a1(khri brgyad stong pa): dmigs shing de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi bar du dmigs nas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ de dmigs pa la spyod cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sems can thams
349a2(khri brgyad stong pa): cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ de'ang dmigs pa'i tshul gyi sa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo ba dang / dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sdig pa thams cad so sor 'chags
349a3(khri brgyad stong pa): pa dang / bdag dang gzhan dag gi bsod nams thams cad la rjes su yi rang ba dang / bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi phyir dmigs nas thabs ma yin pas sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba 'debs pa dang / phung
349a4(khri brgyad stong pa): po gsum pa'i bsod nams thabs ma yin pas sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su sngo ba de ni 'jig rten pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya/
349a5(khri brgyad stong pa): de la 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang zhe na/ bdag dang / sems can dang / sbyin par bya ba mi dmigs pa'i shes rab 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas/ byang chub kyi phyir
349a6(khri brgyad stong pa): sbyin dA'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang sems can dang / tshul khrims dang / byang chub mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas/ byang chub kyi phyir
349a7(khri brgyad stong pa): tshul khrims yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / bzod pa dang / byang chub mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas/ byang chub kyi phyir bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su spyod
349b1(khri brgyad stong pa): bar byed pa dang bdag dang / lus dang / sems dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsod nams dang ye shes mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsus yongs su dag pas byang chub kyi phyir brtson 'grus/
349b2(khri brgyad stong pa): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su myong bar byed pa dang / bdag dang / sems can dang / bsam gtan dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mi dmigs te/ 'khor gsum yongs su dag
349b3(khri brgyad stong pa): pas byang chub kyi phyir bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa dang / sems can thams cad mi dmigs pas/ byang chub kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyong bar byed pa
349b4(khri brgyad stong pa): dang dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyang yongs su rdzo ba drug med pa dang / yongs su sngo ba bla na med pa dang / yongs su sngo ba mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang / yongs su sngo ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
349b5(khri brgyad stong pa): yongs su sngo ba mtshungs pa med pa dang / yongs su sngo ba dpag tu med pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su sngo bar byed pa ste/ de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
349b6(khri brgyad stong pa): tu phyin pa zhes bya'o// ci'i phyir na 'jig rten pa zhes bya/ ci'i phyir na 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya zhe na/ de la 'jig rten pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang dag gis 'jig rten du 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig
349b7(khri brgyad stong pa): rten 'grub par byed pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten dang mnyam pa dang / gang dag gis 'jig rten gyi phyir sbyin pa dang / gang dag gis 'jig rten las 'byung bar mi 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten 'byung
350a1(khri brgyad stong pa): bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa zhes bya'o// de la 'jig rten las 'das pa gang zhe na/ gang dag gis 'jig
350a2(khri brgyad stong pa): rten sgrol ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten sel bar byed pa dang / 'jig rten gang dag gis sgrol bar byed pa dang / gang dag 'jig rten ma yin par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gis 'jig rten las
350a3(khri brgyad stong pa): 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten las sgrol ba dang / gang dag 'jig rten du sgrol bar byed pa ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa zhes bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sem
350a4(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa ni/ de ltar byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong bar byed do// shA ri'i bus smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems
350a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin no//
350a6(khri brgyad stong pa): yang dag par spongs pa bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'bags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar
350a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang ga ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo tham
350b1(khri brgyad stong pa): cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang 'byams pa chen po dang / sri
350b2(khri brgyad stong pa): rje chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam zhes bya'o// shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de pha rol tu phyin pa gang gi
350b3(khri brgyad stong pa): skyes bu'i rtsal yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i skyes bu'i rtsal yin no// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab
350b4(khri brgyad stong pa): pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad kyis
350b5(khri brgyad stong pa): par byed pa yin pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni nyan thos kyi chos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams dang / sa
350b6(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas kyi chos rnams dang / dge ba'i chos thams cad yongs su 'dzin cing yang dag par 'dzin par byed pa yin no// tshe dang pA shA ri'i bu sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog
350b7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyad nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur to// tshe dang ldan pa
351a1(khri brgyad stong pa): shA ri'i bu ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas pa bla na med pa yang dag/
351a2(khri brgyad stong pa): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag da ltar phyogs
351a3(khri brgyad stong pa): bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes pa de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sa
351a4(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyas so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa na/ gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nem nur med cing rmongs pa med par gyur na/ byang chub sems
351a5(khri brgyad stong pa): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni/ 'di lta ste/ sems can thams cad bskyab pa dang / sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtang ba'i phyir 'di ltar gnas pa 'dis gnas par rig par bya ste/
351a6(khri brgyad stong pa): de'ang mi gnas pa'i tshul gyis gnas shing / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de mi 'di lta ste/ snying rje chen po yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar rig par bya'o// shA ri'i bus
351a7(khri brgyad stong pa): pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la ste/ snying rje chen po yid la byed pa'i yid la byed pa de dang ma bral bar gnas pa des gnas pa de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yin par 'dod na
351b1(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar na sems can thams cad kyang byang chub sems dpa' yin par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di ltar sems can thams cad ni yid la byed pa dang /
351b2(khri brgyad stong pa): ma bral ba'i phyir ro// rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu legs so legs so// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang dag pa'i tshig brjod pas don de nyid yongs su bzung ba ni/
351b3(khri brgyad stong pa): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dmigs su phebs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sems can med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa med par rig par bya/ sems can stong pa nyid kyi phyir//
351b4(khri brgyad stong pa): yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya/ sems can dben pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa dben par rig par bya// sems can ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyirayid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya/
351b5(khri brgyad stong pa): zhing nga sems can mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya ba'i phyir ro// tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs med pa'i
351b6(khri brgyad stong pa): phyir yid la byed pa med par rig par bya// gzugs stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ yid la byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya/ gzugs dben pa nyid kyi phyir/ yid la byed pa dben pa nyid du rig par bya/ gzugs
351b7(khri brgyad stong pa): ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par rig par bya/ gzugs mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya'o//
352a1(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin du tshor ba dang / 'du shes dang / 'du byed rnams dang / rnam par shes pa med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o// rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ yid la/
352a2(khri brgyad stong pa): byed pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa dben pa nyid du rig par bya'o// rnam par shes pa ngo bo nyid med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa ngo bo nyid med par
352a3(khri brgyad stong pa): rig par bya'o// rnam par shes pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med par rig par bya'o// de bzhin du khams rnams dang /
352a4(khri brgyad stong pa): mched rnams dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / bden pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang / pha rol tu phyin pa dang / stong pa nyid thams cad dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
352a5(khri brgyad stong pa): gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa med par rig par bya'o// de bzhin du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid stong pa nyid dang //
352a6(khri brgyad stong pa): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ngo bo nyid med pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba med pa'i phyir/ yid la byed pa/
352a7(khri brgyad stong pa): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgyab med par rig par bya ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni gnas pa 'di dang / yid la byed pa 'di dang ma bral /
352b1(khri brgyad stong pa): zhes kho bo smra'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rab 'byor legs so legs so// 'di skar de bzhin gshegs pa'i
352b2(khri brgyad stong pa): mthus ji sar cod kyis bstan pa de ltar/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la'ang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bskrun par bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen par
352b3(khri brgyad stong pa): kyang ji skar khyod kyis bstan pa de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa na/ stong gsum gyi ngong
352b4(khri brgyad stong pa): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos te/ g.yos/ rab tu g.yos so// kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul/ rab tu 'gul/ kun tu rab tu 'gul to// ldag/ rab tu ldag/ kun
352b5(khri brgyad stong pa): tu rabu rdeg go// 'jugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro// chem chem/ rab tu che mtsham/ kun tu rab tu chem tsham mo// shar phyog
352b6(khri brgyad stong pa): dma' na nub phyogs mtho// nub phyogs dma' na shar phyogs mtho// lce phyogs dpa' na byang phyogs mtho/ byang phyogs dma' na lho phyogs mtho// dbus dma' na mtha' mtho// mtha' dma' na dbus mthong
352b7(khri brgyad stong pa): gyur to// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad par
353a1(khri brgyad stong pa): rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab 'byor ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di na/ nga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston pa de
353a2(khri brgyad stong pa): bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag na'ang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ byang chub sems dpa'
353a3(khri brgyad stong pa): sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston par mdzad do// de bzhin du phyogs bcu khor yug kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med grangs med pa dag na'ang /
353a4(khri brgyad stong pa): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dge par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid smon par mdzad do// cho
353a5(khri brgyad stong pa): ldan pa rab 'byor gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di bshad pa na/ lha dang mi'i skye dgu rnams las srog chags 'bum nyi shrI sa mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to// phyogs bcu kun gyi/
353a6(khri brgyad stong pa): 'jig rten gyi khams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid ston pa mdzad pa na'ang / sems can dang
353a7(khri brgyad stong pa): tu med grangs med pa rnams kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yum 'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu gyi
353b1(khri brgyad stong pa): pa gyi brjod stong pa las/ gnas brtan rab 'byor gyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// / de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir rgyal po chen po gang dag/
